**La Roche-Posay Lipikar Syndet AP+ Body Wash for Eczema Prone Skin 200ml** is the perfect body wash for dry, sensitive, and eczema-prone skin. It rebalances the skin and soothes itching and irritation. â­ Enriched with Shea Butter and Niacinamide. â­ Suitable for babies, children, and adults. â­ Fast-absorbing and non-sticky. â­ Fragrance-free and paraben-free. â­ Gentle on the skin. â­ Protects skin from external aggressions. â­ Reinforces the skin barrier long-term. â­ Provides intense hydration. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay Lipikar Syndet AP+ Body Wash for Eczema Prone Skin 200ml**: 
â­ Gently cleanse your skin using **La Roche-Posay Lipikar Syndet AP+ Body Wash for Eczema Prone Skin 200ml**. â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. â­ Use once or twice daily as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay Lipikar Syndet AP+ Body Wash for Eczema Prone Skin 200ml**: 
â­ Shea Butter â­ Niacinamide â­ AP+M Technology

description_en:
**La Roche Posay Effaclar Acne Purifying Foaming Gel Cleanser for Oily Skin Refill 400ml** is the perfect solution for oily, acne-prone skin. â­ Deeply cleanses, removing dirt and impurities. â­ Balances skin's pH, reducing acne breakouts. â­ Gentle formula, won't dry out skin. â­ Suitable for daily use, morning and night. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche Posay Effaclar Acne Purifying Foaming Gel Cleanser for Oily Skin Refill 400ml**: 
â­ Wash your face twice daily, morning and night. 
â­ Apply an adequate amount of **La Roche Posay Effaclar Acne Purifying Foaming Gel Cleanser for Oily Skin Refill 400ml** to your wet hands. 
â­ Gently massage onto your skin using circular motions. 
â­ Rinse your face with lukewarm water. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche Posay Effaclar Acne Purifying Foaming Gel Cleanser for Oily Skin Refill 400ml**: 
â­ AQUA / WATER / EAU 
â­ SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE 
â­ PEG-8 
â­ COCO-BETAINE 
â­ HEXYLENE GLYCOL 
â­ SODIUM CHLORIDE 
â­ PUNICA GRANATUM PERICARP EXTRACT 
â­ ZINC PCA 
â­ PEG-120 METHYL GLUCOSE DIOLEATE 
â­ SODIUM CITRATE 
â­ SODIUM HYDROXIDE 
â­ CAPRYLYL GLYCOL 
â­ CITRIC ACID 
â­ TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE 
â­ MALTODEXTRIN 
â­ PENTYLENE GLYCOL 
â­ TOCOPHEROL 
â­ SODIUM BENZOATE 
â­ PHENOXYETHANOL 
â­ PARFUM / FRAGRANCE.

description_en:
**La Roche-Posay Anthelios Hydrating Lotion Sunscreen SPF 50+ for Face & Body 250 ml** is a luxurious face and body sunscreen with a lightweight formula that leaves no white marks.  It's suitable for sensitive and reactive skin prone to sun intolerance, offering superior protection against harmful UVA/UVB rays.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay Anthelios Hydrating Lotion Sunscreen SPF 50+ for Face & Body 250 ml**:
â­ Apply liberally before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently after swimming or sweating.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay Anthelios Hydrating Lotion Sunscreen SPF 50+ for Face & Body 250 ml**:
â­ Aqua / Water / Eau
â­ Isopropyl Palmitate
â­ Alcohol Denat.
â­ Ethylhexyl Triazone
â­ Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane
â­ And more effective ingredients.

**Product Features:**
â­ High SPF 50+ sun protection
â­ Long-lasting hydration
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin
â­ Non-greasy, leaves no white cast
â­ Water and sweat resistant
â­ Eco-friendly packaging

description_en:
**La Roche-Posay Lipikar Syndet Ap+ Anti-Irritation Lipid Wash Cream Refill** is a creamy gel wash ideal for newborns, babies, children, and adults with atopic eczema-prone skin. â­ Suitable for sensitive, itchy skin prone to scratching. â­ Suitable for baby's scalp and for use on cradle cap. â­ Immediately soothes and helps reduce severe dryness starting from the shower. â­ Also suitable for: Sensitive, very dry, and itch-prone skin. â­ Tested under pediatric control and tested under ophthalmological control. â­ High tolerance. â­ Allergy-tested. â­ Fragrance free. â­ Eco-friendly packaging contains 73% less plastic than the classic 400ml bottle of Lipikar.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay Lipikar Syndet Ap+ Anti-Irritation Lipid Wash Cream Refill**:
â­ Apply to moistened skin.
â­ Massage gently.
â­ Rinse.
â­ Does not sting the eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay Lipikar Syndet Ap+ Anti-Irritation Lipid Wash Cream Refill**:
â­ Aqua / Water / Eau â­ Glycerin â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate â­ Peg-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate â­ Coco-Betaine â­ Polysorbate 20 â­ Citric Acid â­ Peg-7 Glycerl Cocoate â­ Niacinamide â­ Disodium Edta â­ Mannose â­ Sodium Hydroxide â­ Vitreoscilla Ferment â­ Butyrospermum Parki Butter / Shea Butter â­ Glycol Distearate â­ Acrylates Copolymer â­ Cocamide Mea â­ Polyquaternium-11 â­ Scdium Chloride â­ Sodium Benzoate (Code Fil.: N286701/1).

description_en:
**La Roche-Posay Physiological Foaming Water for Sensitive Skin 150ml** is a gentle foaming cleanser that effectively removes makeup from sensitive skin. â­Cleansing agents are selected for optimal tolerance and high makeup removing power. â­Physiological pH, soap-free, alcohol-free, colorant-free, paraben-free. â­Smooths the skin and respects its physiological balance. â­Enriched with polymers stemming from medicated eye washes. â­Contains Poloxamer, a mild cleansing agent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay Physiological Foaming Water for Sensitive Skin 150ml**: 
â­Apply to damp skin. â­Massage with fingertips in circular movements. â­Rinse thoroughly with warm water. â­Avoid the eye area.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay Physiological Foaming Water for Sensitive Skin 150ml**: 
â­La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water (for soothing and softening). â­Glycerin (for moisturizing).

description_en:
**La Roche-Posay Anthelios XL Anti-Shine Co-Pack (1+1)** provides superior sun protection for all skin types. This lightweight, fast-absorbing formula leaves no white residue and is perfect for oily and combination skin. It's also safe for sensitive skin, offering broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay Anthelios XL Anti-Shine Co-Pack (1+1)**:
â­ Apply generously before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or sweating.
â­ Use a sufficient amount to cover all exposed skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay Anthelios XL Anti-Shine Co-Pack (1+1)**:
â­ Safe and effective ingredients for sun protection.
â­ Paraben-free.
â­ Non-greasy formula.
â­ Water-resistant.

description_en:
**La Roche-Posay 10% Pure Vitamin C Anti Aging Face Serum for Wrinkles 30ml** is an anti-aging vitamin C serum that leaves skin radiant, soft, and hydrated. It visibly reduces wrinkles and improves skin texture and tone. This serum combines concentrated 10% pure vitamin C, salicylic acid, and neurosensine for optimal effectiveness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay 10% Pure Vitamin C Anti Aging Face Serum for Wrinkles 30ml**: 
â­ Apply the serum each morning to the face and neck.
â­ Avoid the eye area.
â­ Follow with a moisturizer and SPF protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay 10% Pure Vitamin C Anti Aging Face Serum for Wrinkles 30ml**: 
â­ 10% Pure Vitamin C: Helps prevent and correct signs of aging, retains moisture, and increases collagen production.
â­ Salicylic Acid: Exfoliates and soothes, and has anti-inflammatory properties.
â­ Neurosensine: Targets skin irritation, and has an anti-inflammatory role.

description_en:
**La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Baume B5+ SPF 50**: Soothing repairing balm for dry, irritated, and sun-exposed skin. This unique formula combines the repairing power of Cicaplast Balm B5 with broad-spectrum SPF 50 protection, helping to protect your skin from the damaging effects of the sun while simultaneously hydrating and soothing dry, cracked, chapped, or chafed skin. Experience all-day hydration and a reduction in the risk of skin cancer and premature aging caused by the sun when used as directed with other sun protection measures. This fragrance-free balm is suitable for sensitive skin and can be used on the face and body.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Baume B5+ SPF 50**:
â­ Apply to clean and dry skin, as often as necessary.
â­ Do not apply directly to open wounds. Avoid lips and eye contour.
â­ Pleasant texture, easy to apply, non-greasy, non-sticky.
â­ Suitable for all skin types. Reapply generously and frequently.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Baume B5+ SPF 50**:
â­ AQUA / WATER â€¢ HOMOSALATE â€¢ PANTHENOL â€¢ ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE â€¢ BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE â€¢ OCTOCRYLENE â€¢ ALCOHOL DENAT. â€¢ BIS-ETHYLHEXYLOXYPHENOL METHOXYPHENYL TRIAZINE â€¢ STYRENE/ACRYLATES COPOLYMER â€¢ ETHYLHEXYL TRIAZONE â€¢ TRIETHANOLAMINE â€¢ DIMETHICONE â€¢ PHENYLBENZIMIDAZOLE SULFONIC ACID â€¢ PEG-8 LAURATE â€¢ SORBITAN OLEATE â€¢ ZINC GLUCONATE â€¢ MADECASSOSIDE â€¢ MANGANESE GLUCONATE â€¢ ISOHEXADECANE â€¢ SODIUM ACRYLATES CROSSPOLYMER-2 â€¢ SILICA â€¢ 2-OLEAMIDO-1,3-OCTADECANEDIOL â€¢ PERLITE â€¢ DROMETRIZOLE TRISILOXANE â€¢ POLOXAMER 338 â€¢ DISODIUM EDTA â€¢ COPPER GLUCONATE â€¢ CAPRYLYL GLYCOL â€¢ POLYSORBATE 80 â€¢ ACRYLAMIDE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE COPOLYMER â€¢ ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER â€¢ BHT â€¢ TOCOPHEROL â€¢ PHENOXYETHANOL

description_en:
**La Roche-Posay Anthelios UV Mune 400 Oil Control SPF 50+ - 50 ml**, an invisible fluid for the face, ideal for oily skin prone to blemishes, sensitivity and sun intolerance.  It contains Mexoryl 400 UV filter, the most efficient filter for protection against very long UVA. Its lightweight, invisible formula protects against long and medium UV rays and melts into the skin without leaving white marks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay Anthelios UV Mune 400 Oil Control SPF 50+ - 50 ml**:
â­ For daily use and sun exposure.
â­ Apply just before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after perspiring or towelling.
â­ Can be used as a makeup base.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay Anthelios UV Mune 400 Oil Control SPF 50+ - 50 ml**:
â­ AQUA / WATER
â­ ALCOHOL DENAT.
â­ TRIETHYL CITRATE
â­ and other ingredients listed in the full product description above.

description_en:
**La Roche-Posay Lipikar Lait 5% Urea** is a body lotion that soothes severely dry skin and relieves itching immediately upon application. It works to restore balance and protect the skin's natural barriers, thus permanently reducing frequent bouts of severe dryness. It is formulated for maximum tolerance and can be used by all family members, from children to seniors.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay Lipikar Lait 5% Urea**:
â­ Cleanse the skin with a gentle soap-free, lipid-replenishing product.
â­ Apply **La Roche-Posay Lipikar Lait 5% Urea** throughout the day as needed.
â­ Apply to face and body once or twice daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay Lipikar Lait 5% Urea**:
â­ 5% Urea: A highly effective exfoliating formula with optimal tolerance for sensitive skin.
â­ Allantoin: Soothes irritation due to skin dryness.

description_en:
**La Roche-Posay Anthelios XL Dry Touch Anti Shine Sunscreen SPF50+** provides very high broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection, helping to shield against some of the damaging effects of infrared radiation and pollution.  Its ultra-dry touch formula absorbs quickly without leaving any white marks. It's water-resistant and non-comedogenic. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay Anthelios XL Dry Touch Anti Shine Sunscreen SPF50+**: 
â­ Apply as the last step in your skincare routine.
â­ Suitable for use under makeup.
â­ Apply liberally just before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently and generously, especially after perspiring or toweling.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay Anthelios XL Dry Touch Anti Shine Sunscreen SPF50+**: 
â­ Paraben-free.
â­ Non-greasy.
â­ Water-resistant.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Fast-absorbing.
â­ Non-comedogenic.

**La Roche-Posay Anthelios SPF 50+ Spray 75 ml (1+1)** provides superior sun protection for sensitive skin. For years, **La Roche-Posay Anthelios** has been the trusted choice for dermatologists, offering superior UVA/UVB protection. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay Anthelios SPF 50+ Spray 75 ml (1+1)**:
â­ Apply generously before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently, especially after swimming or sweating.
â­ Use a sunscreen that offers sufficient protection for your skin type.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay Anthelios SPF 50+ Spray 75 ml (1+1)**:
â­ Paraben-free formula.
â­ Fast-absorbing, non-greasy, and water-resistant.
â­ Suitable for sensitive and oily skin.
â­ Provides high protection against UVA and UVB rays.

description_en:
**La Roche-Posay Effaclar Acne Serum** is a powerful face serum specifically formulated for oily, acne-prone skin.  It features a potent blend of salicylic acid, niacinamide, and La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water.  It helps reduce the appearance of acne, dark spots, and other imperfections, leaving skin feeling smooth and balanced.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **La Roche-Posay Effaclar Acne Serum**:
â­ Cleanse your face thoroughly before use.
â­ Apply 2-3 drops of **La Roche-Posay Effaclar Acne Serum** to your skin.
â­ Gently massage until absorbed.
â­ Use sunscreen during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **La Roche-Posay Effaclar Acne Serum**:
â­ Salicylic Acid
â­ Niacinamide
â­ La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water
â­ Other effective ingredients

**Laroche-Posay Redermic R Retinol Night Cream 30Ml** is a powerful retinol night cream designed to rejuvenate your skin. â­Reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. â­Improves skin texture and radiance. â­Minimizes the look of dark spots. â­Suitable for sensitive skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Laroche-Posay Redermic R Retinol Night Cream 30Ml**: 
â­Apply a small amount to your cleansed face before bedtime. â­Start with once-daily use, gradually increasing as tolerated. â­Use a high SPF sunscreen during the day. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Laroche-Posay Redermic R Retinol Night Cream 30Ml**: 
â­Retinol â­Moisturizing ingredients â­Soothing ingredients

description_en:
**Lens Me** Contact Lenses Marble for a fashionable look and clear vision.  These soft contact lenses are made of high-quality Polymacon, meeting the needs of the global market. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lens Me**: 
â­ Wash your hands with soap and water.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid and pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the sclera (white part of your eye).
â­ Look straight ahead until the lens is centered.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lens Me**: 
â­ Polymacon material.
â­ Lens diameter: 14.2 mm.
â­ 38% water content for hydration.
â­ 6-month lifespan after opening.

â­ High oxygen permeability.
â­ Moist surface, resistant to bending and breakage.
â­ Strict quality control.

description_en:
**Lens Me** Multi-Purpose Solution is the perfect solution for all types of contact lenses.  It cleans, disinfects, and lubricates, providing advanced care for both colored and medical lenses. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lens Me**: 
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before touching the lenses.
â­ Dry your hands completely after washing.
â­ Avoid touching the lenses with your fingernails.
â­ Use lubricating eye drops to protect your eyes.
â­ Soak lenses overnight in the solution.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lens Me**: 
â­ Advanced contact lens care solution.

**Warnings and Cautions:**
â­ Apply makeup after inserting lenses and remove lenses before removing makeup.
â­ Avoid direct sunlight while wearing lenses, or use sunglasses.
â­ If you experience any eye symptoms, consult your doctor immediately.
â­ Regular eye exams are recommended.
â­ Remove lenses before sleeping and store them in the solution.
â­ If redness or irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult your eye doctor.

description_en:
**Lens Me** Contact Lenses for a fashionable look and clear vision. Soft contact lenses made from high-quality Polymacon material, meeting the needs of the global market. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lens Me**: 
â­ Wash your hands with soap and water.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the sclera (white part of your eye).
â­ Look straight ahead until the lens is centered.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lens Me**: 
â­ Polymacon material.
â­ 14.2 mm diameter.
â­ 38% water content.
â­ 6-month usage period.

â­ High oxygen permeability.
â­ Excellent hydration.
â­ Tear and flex resistance.
â­ Compatible with various eye needs.

description_en:
**Lens Me** soft contact lenses, made from Polymacon, for a fashionable look and clear vision. Our technology and quality have proven effective in meeting the needs of the global market and have received the necessary approvals.

â­ High oxygen permeability
â­ Excellent hydration (38% water)
â­ High durability and resistance to bending and tearing
â­ Lens diameter: 14.2 mm
â­ Usable for 6 months after first use

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lens Me**: 
â­ Wash your hands with soap and water.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the sclera (white area) of your eye.
â­ Look straight ahead until the lens is centered.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lens Me**: Made from high-quality Polymacon material.

description_en:
**Lensme Contact Lenses** for a fashionable look and clear vision.  These soft contact lenses are made from high-quality Polymacon material, meeting the needs of the global market. **Lensme** features high oxygen permeability, excellent surface wettability, and dimensional stability.  They are resistant to bending and breakage, with high-quality materials and quality control.  The lens diameter is 14.5 mm, usable for 6 months after the first use, with 38% water content for superior comfort. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lensme Contact Lenses**: 
â­ Wash your hands with soap and water.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the sclera (white area of your eye).
â­ Look ahead until the lens is centered.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lensme Contact Lenses**: 
â­ High-quality Polymacon.
â­ 38% water content.

description_en:
**Lens Me** Contact Lenses Tan (Special Edition) for a fashionable look and clear vision. Made from Polymacon, its quality is proven globally effective.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lens Me**: 
â­ Wash your hands with soap and water.
â­ Put the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the sclera (white area of your eye).
â­ Look straight ahead until the lens is centered.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lens Me**: 
â­ Lenses made from Polymacon material.
â­ Lens diameter: 14.2 mm.
â­ 38% water content.
â­ 6-month usage duration.

description_en:
**Lens Me** Gray Contact Lenses offer a stylish look and clear vision. Made from high-quality Polymacon material, **Lens Me** meets the needs of the global market.  **Lens Me** features high oxygen permeability, excellent surface wettability, dimensional stability, and resistance to bending and breakage. The lens diameter is 14.2 mm, and it can be used for 6 months.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lens Me**: 
â­ Wash your hands with soap and water.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid and pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Place the lens on the sclera (white part of your eye) and look straight ahead until it centers.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lens Me**: 
â­ Polymacon material.
â­ 14.2 mm diameter.
â­ 38% water content.

**Lens Me** Contact Lenses Malakite offer a fashionable look and clear vision. Made from high-quality Polymacon, these comfortable lenses are globally approved to meet various market needs. â­ High Oxygen Permeability â­ Excellent Hydration â­ Superior Durability â­ 14.2 mm Diameter â­ 6-Month Use

â­ Wash hands with soap and water.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift the upper eyelid and pull down the lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the sclera (white part of the eye).
â­ Look ahead until the lens is centered.

description_en:
**Lens Me** soft contact lenses, made of Polymacon, for a fashionable look and clear vision. Our technology and quality have proven satisfactory in global markets. 

â­ High Oxygen Permeability.
â­ High Surface Wettability.
â­ Dimensional Stability.
â­ Flexure Resistance.
â­ Fracture Resistance.
â­ High-Quality Materials and Quality Control.
â­ 14.2 mm Lens Diameter.
â­ 6-Month Use After First Use.
â­ 38% Water Content for Eye Comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lens Me**: 
â­ Wash your hands with soap and water.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the sclera (white area of your eye).
â­ Look ahead until the lens is centered.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lens Me**: Polymacon (Hydrogel Material).

â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before use.
â­ Avoid dust.
â­ Avoid soap or cosmetics entering the eye.
â­ Do not use after expiry date.
â­ Store in solution after use.

description_en:
**Lensme** Contact Lenses - Doll, for a fashionable look and clear vision.  **Lensme** is made of high-quality Polymacon, to suit various needs of the worldwide market. **Lensme** features many advantages, including:

â­ Oxygen Permeability
â­ Surface Wettability
â­ Dimensional Stability
â­ Flexure Resistance
â­ Fracture Resistance
â­ High-Quality Materials & Precise Control
â­ 14.5 mm Diameter
â­ 6-Month Usable Period After First Use
â­ 38% Water Content for Eye Comfort

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lensme**:
â­ Wash your hands with soap and water.
â­ Place the lens on your index finger.
â­ Gently lift your upper eyelid.
â­ Gently pull down your lower eyelid.
â­ Look to the side and place the lens on the sclera (white area).
â­ Look straight ahead until the lens is centered.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lensme**:
â­ Polymacon

Warnings:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before using lenses.
â­ Avoid direct eye exposure to dust.
â­ Avoid getting soap or cosmetics in your eyes.
â­ Do not use lenses for more than 6 months.
â­ Do not use lenses after the expiration date.
â­ Store lenses in solution after use.

description_en:
**Lifebuoy Total 10 Hand Wash** makes handwashing quicker and more effective than ever before!  This advanced hand wash provides superior germ protection with its Activ Silver Formula, offering 99.9% germ protection in just 10 seconds. Enjoy fresh fragrance and germ-free, clean hands.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Total 10 Hand Wash**: 
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of **Lifebuoy Total 10 Hand Wash**.
â­ Rub your hands together for at least 20 seconds.
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Total 10 Hand Wash**:
â­ Water
â­ Myristic Acid
â­ Lauric Acid
â­ Potassium Hydroxide
â­ Potassium Chloride
â­ Palmitic Acid
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Glycol Distearate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Fragrance
â­ Terpineol
â­ Thymol
â­ Silver Oxide

â­ Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose

â­ BHT
â­ Edetic Acid

â­ Capric Acid

â­ Stearic Acid

â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ PVP/VA Copolymer
â­ Pentasodium Pentetate
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional
â­ Coumarin
â­ Color 45100.

**Lifebuoy Body Wash Mild Care** provides effective germ protection while gently moisturizing your skin.  Experience the perfect blend of cleanliness and care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Body Wash Mild Care**: 
â­ Wet a loofah or sponge. 
â­ Apply a suitable amount of **Lifebuoy Body Wash Mild Care** onto the loofah or sponge. 
â­ Lather and massage gently all over your body. 
â­ Leave for 3-5 minutes. 
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Body Wash Mild Care**:

description_en:
**Lifebuoy Hand Wash Cool Fresh 200 ml** is a refreshing hand wash containing organic menthol crystals from nourishing peppermint leaf oil. Its advanced formula is gentle on your hands, keeping them healthy and protected from germs. Peppermint is known for its healing properties, used by ancient Romans and Greeks. The cool menthol fragrance protects your hands from infections. Ordinary soap takes a minute to kill germs, but do kids wash their hands that long?  **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Cool Fresh 200 ml** provides advanced 99.9% germ protection with Activ Silver Formula in just 10 seconds. It's designed to protect your family from germs. Keep your hands clean and healthy. Wash your hands five times daily (after toilet, before meals, during bath) with **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Cool Fresh 200 ml** to protect your kids from germs and diseases. The handy pump bottle is perfect for the whole family.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Cool Fresh 200 ml**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of handwash.
â­ Rub your hands together for 20 seconds.
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Cool Fresh 200 ml**:
â­ Water â­ Myristic Acid â­ Lauric Acid â­ Potassium Hydroxide â­ Potassium Chloride â­ Palmitic Acid â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate â­ Glycol Distearate â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine â­ Fragrance â­ Terpineol â­ Thymol â­ Silver Oxide â­ Phenoxyethanol â­ Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose â­ Sodium Chloride â­ Glycerin â­ BHT â­ Edetic Acid â­ Tetrasodium EDTA â­ Piroctone Olamine â­ Capric Acid â­ Propylene Glycol â­ Stearic Acid â­ Citric Acid â­ Sodium Benzoate â­ PVP/VA Copolymer â­ Pentasodium Pentetate â­ Menthol â­ Benzyl Alcohol â­ Benzyl Salicylate â­ Butylphenyl Methylpropional â­ Limonene â­ Color 42090

description_en:
**Lifebuoy Hand Wash** provides gentle care for your hands and family.  It keeps your hands clean and soft while offering advanced germ protection. Specially formulated for sensitive skin, it's tough on germs but gentle on your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Hand Wash**: 
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Lifebuoy Hand Wash**.
â­ Rub your hands together for at least 20 seconds.
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with clean water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Hand Wash**: 
â­ Aqua, Sodium laureth sulfate, Sodium chloride, Glycol distearate, Cocamide MEA, Parfum, Terpineol, Thymol, Silver oxide, Citric acid, Acrylates copolymer, Sodium benzoate, PPG-9, Sodium hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, VP/VA Copolymer, Glycerin, Pentasodium pentetate, PEG-40 hydrogenated castor oil, Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) seed oil, Prunus persica (Peach) juice, Dried cream, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) oil, Prunus amygdalus dulcis (Sweet almond) oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
**Lifebuoy Hand Wash Lemon Fresh 500ml** is the perfect hand wash to keep your hands clean and protected from germs. This amazing wash gives you 100% stronger germ protection, thanks to its effective formula with Activ Silver+ Technology.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Lemon Fresh 500ml**: 
â­ Wash your hands with warm water and a generous amount of **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Lemon Fresh 500ml**.
â­ Rub your hands together for at least 20 seconds, focusing on the backs of your hands and between your fingers.
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with clean water.
â­ Dry your hands with a clean towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Lemon Fresh 500ml**: 
â­ Aqua, Sodium laureth sulfate, Sodium chloride, Glycol distearate, Cocamide MEA, Parfum, Terpineol, Thymol, Silver oxide, Citric acid, Acrylates copolymer, Sodium benzoate, PPG-9, Sodium hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, VP/VA Copolymer, Glycerin, Pentasodium pentetate, Sodium sulfate, Honey, Citrus aurantium dulcis (Orange) juice, Citrus medica limonum (Lemon) juice, Fragaria ananassa (Strawberry) fruit juice, Prunus persica (Peach) juice, Pyrus malus (Apple) juice, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, CI 19140, CI 47005

description_en:
**Lifebuoy Total 10** Bathing Bar Soap offers superior germ protection for your family! This powerful soap fights germs 10 times better than ordinary soap, thanks to its Activ Silver ingredient that penetrates and destroys germs from within. Give your family complete protection from illness with **Lifebuoy Total 10**. Use it daily for handwashing at five key moments (after toilet use, before meals, during bath) to keep your family healthy and clean.  **Lifebuoy Total 10**, your ideal choice for cleanliness and prevention. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Total 10**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of **Lifebuoy Total 10**.
â­ Rub your hands together for at least 20 seconds.
â­ Rinse your hands with clean water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Total 10**:
â­ Sodium tallowate or Sodium palmate
â­ Sodium palm kernelate or cocoate
â­ Aqua
â­ Glycerin and/or Sorbitol
â­ Parfum
â­ Sodium sulfate and/or Sodium chloride
â­ Sodium lauryl sulfate
â­ Lauric or Coconut or Palm kernel fatty acid
â­ Pentasodium pentetate
â­ Tetrasodium EDTA
â­ Thymol
â­ Terpineol
â­ Silver oxide
â­ Etidronic acid
â­ VP/VA copolymer
â­ Benzyl alcohol
â­ Butylphenyl methylpropional
â­ Coumarin
â­ Geraniol
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool
â­ CI 11680
â­ CI 12490

description_en:
**Lifebuoy Hand Wash Sea Minerals 500 ML** is a refreshing handwash with a special formulation containing sea minerals and salt. It's a natural antibacterial and antioxidant, keeping your hands clean and healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Sea Minerals 500 ML**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Sea Minerals 500 ML**.
â­ Rub your hands together for at least 20 seconds.
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with clean water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Sea Minerals 500 ML**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium laureth sulfate
â­ Glycol distearate
â­ Sodium chloride
â­ Cocamide MEA
â­ Parfum
â­ Terpineol
â­ Thymol
â­ Silver oxide

â­ Limonene

**Lifebuoy Hand Wash Lemon Fresh 200 ml** offers superior germ protection with a refreshing lemon scent. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Lemon Fresh 200 ml**: 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Lemon Fresh 200 ml** to wet hands. 
â­ Rub hands together for at least 20 seconds. 
â­ Rinse thoroughly with clean water. 
â­ Use daily for clean and sanitized hands. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Lemon Fresh 200 ml**: 
â­ Aqua, Sodium laureth sulfate, Sodium chloride, Glycol distearate, Cocamide MEA, Parfum, Terpineol, Thymol, Silver oxide, Citric acid, Acrylates copolymer, Sodium benzoate, PPG-9, Sodium hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, VP/VA Copolymer, Glycerin, Pentasodium pentetate, Sodium sulfate, Honey, Citrus aurantium dulcis (Orange) juice, Citrus medica limonum (Lemon) juice, Fragaria ananassa (Strawberry) fruit juice, Prunus persica (Peach) juice, Pyrus malus (Apple) juice, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, CI 19140, CI 47005.

description_en:
**Lifebuoy Hand Wash Cool Fresh** 500ml is the perfect hand wash for germ protection and long-lasting freshness. This hand wash gives you 100% stronger germ protection in just 10 seconds, forming a powerful germ shield that lasts for up to 10 hours between washes. **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Cool Fresh** is infused with 10x refreshing menthol for 12 hours of lasting freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Cool Fresh**: 
â­ Wet your hands with warm water. 
â­ Apply an adequate amount of **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Cool Fresh** to your hands. 
â­ Rub your hands together for at least 20 seconds. 
â­ Rinse your hands thoroughly with clean water. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Hand Wash Cool Fresh**: 
â­ Menthol 
â­ Multivitamins 
â­ Other skin-safe ingredients.

description_en:
**Lifebuoy Body Wash Care**, the perfect body wash for sensitive skin. â­ Deeply cleanses and removes germs. â­ Contains moisturizing and refreshing milk cream. â­ Provides up to 10 times more antibacterial protection. â­ Easy to use, even for children. â­ Leaves skin soft, clean, and refreshed. â­ Ideal for daily use. â­ Rich, thick lather reaches hard-to-reach areas. â­ Provides a long-lasting feeling of freshness and cleanliness. â­ **Lifebuoy Body Wash Care** is your best choice for protecting and caring for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Body Wash Care**: 
â­ Wet a loofah and pour a small amount of **Lifebuoy Body Wash Care** onto it. 
â­ Squeeze the loofah to create lather. 
â­ Apply the loofah to your body. 
â­ Rinse well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Body Wash Care**: 
â­ Aqua, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Potassium Chloride, Palmitic Acid, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Fragrance, Glycol Distearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Terpineol, Thymol, Silver Oxide, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Sodium Chloride, Butyl Hydroxytoluene, Tetrasodium EDTA, Etidronic Acid, Piroctone Olamine, Capric Acid, Propylene Glycol, Stearic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, VP/VA Copolymer, Pentasodium Pentetate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil, Dragon Fruit Extract, Dried Milk Cream Powder, Lavender Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
**Lifebuoy Bar Soap Honey & Turmeric 125 gm** is a refreshing body soap with a special formulation containing the benefits of honey and turmeric, natural antioxidants and antibacterial agents. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Bar Soap Honey & Turmeric 125 gm**:
â­ Gently massage the soap onto your skin, or lather using a loofah.
â­ Rinse with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Bar Soap Honey & Turmeric 125 gm**:
â­ Sodium palmate, Sodium palm kernelate, Aqua, Glycerin, Parfum, Sodium sulfate and/or Sodium chloride, Sodium lauryl sulfate, Titanium Dioxide, Pentasodium pentetate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Lauric Acid, Thymol, Terpineol, Silver oxide, Etidronic acid, VP/VA copolymer, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Juice, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Juice, Fragaria Ananassa (Strawberry) Fruit Juice, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Juice, Honey, Prunus Persica (Peach) Juice, Curcuma Aromatica Root Oil, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, CI 11680

description_en:
**Lifebuoy Shower Gel Lemon Fresh** offers an irresistible refreshing experience with the invigorating scent of lemon!  **Lifebuoy Shower Gel Lemon Fresh** contains an effective formula that helps deeply cleanse and protect your skin from germs, leaving you feeling clean and refreshed all day long. It's easily absorbed into the skin and won't cause dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lifebuoy Shower Gel Lemon Fresh**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Lifebuoy Shower Gel Lemon Fresh** to your hand or puff.
â­ Work into a lather and apply all over your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifebuoy Shower Gel Lemon Fresh**:
â­Water â­Myristic Acid â­Lauric Acid â­Potassium Hydroxide â­Potassium Chloride â­Palmitic Acid â­Sodium Laureth Sulfate â­Fragrance â­Diisostearyl Glycol â­Cocamidopropyl Betaine â­Terpineol â­Thymol â­Silver Oxide â­Glycerin â­Phenoxyethanol â­Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose â­Sodium Chloride â­BHT â­Tetrasodium EDTA â­Etidronic Acid â­piroctone olamine â­Capric Acid â­Propylene Glycol â­Stearic Acid â­Citric Acid â­Sodium Benzoate â­PV/VA Copolymer â­Pentasodium Pentetate â­Sodium Sulfate â­Honey â­Orange Juice â­Lemon Juice â­Strawberry Juice â­Peach Juice â­Apple Juice â­Benzyl Alcohol â­Benzyl Benzoate â­Benzyl Salicylate â­Butylphenyl Methylpropional â­Citral â­Citronellol â­Hexyl Cinnamal â­Limonene â­Linalool â­Color 19140 & 47005

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lifree Adult Diaper Culotte XL 3 Cups - 16 Pcs**: 
â­ Soft, high-absorbency quality materials. â­ Soft, skin-friendly top layer. â­ Inner layer for fluid absorption. â­ Leak-proof outer layer.

description_en:
**Loreal Magic Retouch Dark Brown 75 ml**, the world's number 1 root concealer brand, perfectly covers grey hair. â­ Suitable for those who use permanent or semi-permanent hair dye. â­ Matches your hair colour, even salon colours, for a natural-looking finish. â­ Perfectly conceal grey roots by matching your hair colour to one of 9 shades, ranging from blonde, brown to black. â­ Use alongside our box colour range: Casting Creme Gloss, Excellence and Preference. â­ Perfect for last-minute emergencies! â­ 75ml size, easily fits in your handbag and is cabin approved. â­ Easy-to-use spray, ideal between salon appointments or the sudden appearance of grey hair. â­ Lightweight formula blends seamlessly with your hair colour. â­ Lasts until washed out with shampoo, and only a small amount is required.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Magic Retouch Dark Brown 75 ml**: â­ The pinpoint micro-diffuser targets greys. â­ The lightweight formula matches perfectly with your hair colour, even salon colours, for ideal blended coverage. â­ Transform your grey hair instantly with easy application. â­ Hold can 10-15cm from hair and spray roots in a light stream. â­ Allow 1 minute to dry before achieving your perfect look. â­ Lasts until washed out with shampoo, and only a small amount is required.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Magic Retouch Dark Brown 75 ml**: (This information will be updated later)

description_en:
**Loreal Magic Retouch Brown 75 ml**, the world's number 1 root concealer brand, perfectly covers grey hair.
â­ Suitable for those using permanent or semi-permanent hair dye.
â­ Matches your hair colour, even salon colours, for a natural look.
â­ Conceals grey roots perfectly with 9 shades, from blonde to brown and black.
â­ Use alongside Loreal's colour range: Casting Creme Gloss, Excellence.
â­ Ideal for emergencies, easily carried in your bag and travel-friendly (cabin approved).
â­ Lightweight formula lasts until washed out with shampoo.
â­ Only a small amount is required.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Magic Retouch Brown 75 ml**
â­ The pinpoint micro-diffuser targets greys precisely.
â­ The lightweight formula matches your hair colour, even salon colours, for ideal coverage.
â­ Hold can 10-15cm from hair and spray roots lightly.
â­ Leave for one minute to dry.
â­ Lasts until washed out with shampoo.

â­ (Ingredients will be listed here when available)

description_en:
**Loreal Hydra Genius** Aloe Water Liquid Moisturizer is a lightweight, effective moisturizer for normal to combination skin. Its water-based, non-greasy formula provides deep, quick-absorbing hydration.  It leaves skin looking fresh and radiant. Contains Hyaluronic Acid and Aloe Vera to keep skin hydrated for up to 72 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Hydra Genius**: 
â­ Replace your daily moisturizer with this formula. 
â­ Apply to face and neck every morning. 
â­ Use alone or after your serum. 
â­ Quickly absorbed, suitable for use before makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Hydra Genius**: 
â­ Aloe Vera Water: A natural moisturizer rich in minerals. 
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Locks in moisture and deeply hydrates the skin.

description_en:
**Loreal Magic Retouch Black 75 ml** is the world's number 1 root concealer brand, offering perfect grey hair coverage. â­ Suitable for users of permanent or semi-permanent hair dye. â­ Matches your hair color, even salon colors, for a natural look. â­ Perfectly conceals grey roots with 9 shades, from blonde to brown and black. â­ Use alongside Loreal's color range: Casting Creme Gloss, Excellence. â­ Ideal for last-minute emergencies. â­ Easy to carry in your handbag and travel-friendly (cabin approved). â­ Lightweight formula lasts until shampooed. â­ Precisely targets and covers grey hair. â­ Only a small amount is needed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Magic Retouch Black 75 ml**: â­ The pinpoint micro-diffuser targets greys. â­ The lightweight formula matches perfectly with your hair color, even salon colors. â­ Hold can 10-15cm from hair and spray roots in a light stream. â­ Allow 1 minute to dry. â­ Lasts until shampooed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Magic Retouch Black 75 ml**: â­ (Ingredients will be listed here when available)

**Ultra Doux Avocado & Shea Butter Shampoo 1000ml** is a natural, rich recipe that deeply nourishes dry or frizzy hair. It contains Avocado Oil and Shea Butter, which work together to moisturize and soften hair without weighing it down.

â­ For dry or frizzy hair
â­ Enriched with nourishing Avocado Oil and softening Shea Butter
â­ Deeply nourishes hair from roots to ends
â­ Leaves hair shiny and incredibly soft
â­ Paraben & Silicone-free formula

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Ultra Doux Avocado & Shea Butter Shampoo 1000ml**:
â­ Apply shampoo to wet hair and massage gently.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, use Ultra Doux conditioner and intensive nourishing cream.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Ultra Doux Avocado & Shea Butter Shampoo 1000ml**:
â­ Avocado Oil
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Other natural ingredients

description_en:
**Loreal Mascara Paradise Extatic - Black**: Get enviable lashes with **Loreal Mascara Paradise Extatic - Black**, a castor oil-enriched mascara that delivers dramatically long and voluminous lashes. Enjoy a feather-soft feel with every coat. Control your lash intensity, from natural to bold and dramatic. All shades are safe for sensitive eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Mascara Paradise Extatic - Black**:
â­ Apply mascara from the base of the lashes to the tips, using a zigzag motion.
â­ Repeat application for desired volume.
â­ For extra intensity, apply to lower lashes as well.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Mascara Paradise Extatic - Black**:
â­ Lash-loving castor oil.
â­ Sensitive-eye safe ingredients.

description_en:
**Loreal Magic Retouch Cold Dark Brown 75 ml**, the world's number 1 root concealer brand, perfectly covers grey hair. â­ Suitable for use with permanent or semi-permanent hair dyes. â­ Matches your hair colour, even salon colours, for a natural-looking finish. â­ Perfectly conceals grey roots with 9 shades, ranging from blonde to brown and black. â­ Use alongside Loreal's box colour range: Casting Creme Gloss, Excellence and Preference. â­ Ideal for last-minute emergencies. â­ Easy to carry in your handbag and travel-friendly (cabin approved). â­ Lightweight formula that lasts until washed out with shampoo. â­ Light and easy spray application. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Magic Retouch Cold Dark Brown 75 ml**: â­ The pinpoint micro-diffuser targets greys precisely. â­ The lightweight formula matches your hair colour perfectly. â­ Hold can 10-15cm from hair and spray roots in a light stream. â­ Allow 1 minute to dry. â­ Lasts until washed out with shampoo. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Magic Retouch Cold Dark Brown 75 ml**: â­ (Ingredients will be listed here when available).

**Loreal Hyaluron Expert Eye Cream 15 ml** is a luxurious moisturizing eye cream. â­ Smooths fine lines and deeply hydrates the skin. â­ Lightweight and non-greasy texture, suitable even for sensitive skin. â­ Enriched with hyaluronic acid for intense hydration and skin elasticity. â­ Ideal for ages 25 to 35. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Hyaluron Expert Eye Cream 15 ml**: â­ Apply daily around the eye area, including eyelids. â­ Gently smooth with your fingertips from the inner to the outer corner of the eye.

**L'Oreal Paris Volume Million Lashes 24 Hour Panorama All Night Black** mascara delivers corner-to-corner panoramic volume that lasts up to 24 hours! This ultra-black mascara is designed to make your eyes look up to 1.4x bigger! â­ Smudge-proof, clump-proof, and flake-proof. â­ Multi-level bristle brush grabs every lash. â­ Rich formula with extreme black pigments and a 5% stretch-flex complex. â­ Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. â­ Easy to remove. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Volume Million Lashes 24 Hour Panorama All Night Black**: 
â­ Use the brush to grab each lash from inner to outer corner. â­ Cap tightly after each use. â­ If a change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. â­ Do not use if your eyes are injured or irritated. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Paris Volume Million Lashes 24 Hour Panorama All Night Black**: â­ Extreme black pigments. â­ 5% stretch-flex complex.

**L'Oreal Paris Infallible More Than Concealer 326 Vanilla** is your solution for various skin concerns. Whether it's blemishes, dark circles, or uneven skin tone, this concealer provides flawless coverage. Available in 8 shades to match all skin tones, making it more than just a concealer; it brightens, corrects, contours & highlights.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Infallible More Than Concealer 326 Vanilla**:
â­ Use a shade that matches your skin tone, apply a small dot on imperfections, and blend with your finger or a brush.
â­ Use a shade lighter than your skin tone under the eyes to conceal dark circles.
â­ Use a shade two to three levels darker than your skin tone to contour.

Its high-pigment elastic formula provides full coverage with a lightweight feel. It features a long-lasting formula, and a matte finish that doesn't crease or settle into fine lines. It comes with a super-sized applicator for ease of use.

**Semi Dilino** is an innovative scalp exfoliating scrub designed to rebalance your scalp and eliminate dandruff. With its effective natural ingredients, it gently and deeply cleanses the scalp, removes dead skin cells, and promotes blood circulation. Say goodbye to dandruff and hair loss with **Semi Dilino**!

â­ Rinse thoroughly.

â­ Effective natural ingredients.
â­ MicroBiotic Technology.
â­ Free from Sulfates, Parabens, Paraffins, and Mineral Oils.

description_en:
**Loreal Glycolic-Bright Glowing Peeling Toner 128ml** is a powerful exfoliating toner formulated with 5% Glycolic Acid to reveal smooth, fresh and glowing skin. â­Visibly reduces dark spots. â­Visibly reduces imperfections. â­Evens skin tone. â­Improves radiance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Glycolic-Bright Glowing Peeling Toner 128ml**: â­Apply morning and/or evening after cleansing. â­Use a cotton pad to apply. â­Use an SPF product in the morning. â­Shake well before use. â­Avoid contact with eyes. â­In case of irritation, reduce frequency of use. â­If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Glycolic-Bright Glowing Peeling Toner 128ml**: â­AQUA / WATER, â­GLYCOLIC ACID, â­HYDROXYETHYLPIPERAZINE ETHANE SULFONIC ACID, â­GLYCERIN, â­SODIUM HYDROXIDE, â­CITRIC ACID, â­PENTYLENE GLYCOL, â­ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, â­PANTHENOL, â­PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, â­PPG-26-BUTETH-26, â­TOCOPHEROL, â­BIS-PEG-18 METHYL ETHER DIMETHYL SILANE, â­BENZYL ALCOHOL, â­CINNAMAL, â­LIMONENE, â­LINALOOL, â­SALICYLIC ACID, â­PARFUM / FRAGRANCE.

description_en:
**Loreal Magic Retouch Dark Blond 75 ml**, the world's number 1 root concealer brand, perfectly covers grey hair. â­ Suitable for those using permanent or semi-permanent hair dye. â­ Matches your hair colour, even salon colours, for a natural look. â­ Perfectly conceals grey roots with 9 shades to match, from blonde to brown and black. â­ Use alongside our box colour range: Casting Creme Gloss, Excellence. â­ Perfect for emergencies, easy to carry in your handbag, and travel-friendly (cabin approved). â­ Lightweight formula lasts until washed out with shampoo. â­ Pinpoint micro-diffuser precisely targets greys. â­ Only a small amount is needed for perfect coverage. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Magic Retouch Dark Blond 75 ml**: â­ The pinpoint micro-diffuser targets greys. â­ The lightweight formula matches your hair colour, even salon colours. â­ Hold can 10-15cm from hair and spray roots lightly. â­ Allow 1 minute to dry. â­ Lasts until washed out with shampoo. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Magic Retouch Dark Blond 75 ml**: â­ (Ingredient list will be added here when available).

description_en:
**Loreal Hyaluron Expert Night Cream Mask 50 ml** is a luxurious night cream mask designed to pamper your skin. â­ Smooths fine lines. â­Intensively hydrates. â­ Boosts skin elasticity. â­ Rich and nourishing texture. â­ Powered by two types of hyaluronic acid for deep hydration and skin smoothing. â­ Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive. â­ Dermatologically tested. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Hyaluron Expert Night Cream Mask 50 ml**: â­ Apply every evening with circular movements on thoroughly cleansed face and neck. â­ To use as a mask, reapply a thicker layer and leave overnight several times a week.

description_en:
**Loreal Skin Expert Clay Brightening Gel Wash**, a pure clay cleanser that brightens your skin. For the first time, L'OrÃ©al Paris laboratories have selected three types of pure clay blended with charcoal in a non-drying detoxifying gel wash formula. For clean, radiant skin every day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Skin Expert Clay Brightening Gel Wash**:
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount to wet face.
â­ Gently massage in small circular motions, focusing on the forehead, nose, and chin.
â­ Avoid the eye area.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Suitable for combination to oily skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Skin Expert Clay Brightening Gel Wash**:
â­ Three types of pure clay: Kaolin, Montmorillonite, and a mineral-rich clay.
â­ Charcoal: for purifying the skin.

Cleanses, detoxifies, and clarifies. Quick & visible results. Deeply cleansed and purified, the skin texture is clear and luminous. Day after day, the skin breathes: it is fresh, pure, and radiantly beautiful. #Loreal #FacialCleanser #SkinCare #HealthySkin #SkinBeauty #SkinCleansing #LorealProducts #NaturalIngredients #SkinBrightening #SkinCareRoutine

**Loreal Matte Resist Major Crush 120**, discover L'Oreal Paris' new powdery matte liquid lipstick that lasts up to 16 hours. Transfer and smudge resistant for an all-day matte finish with a lightweight feel. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid. Get bold color payoff in one effortless swipe with a precise applicator. Available in a variety of irresistible shades. Find yours today!

description_en:
**Loreal Glycolic-Bright Eye Serum 20 ml** is a specialized eye serum designed to visibly reduce the appearance of dark circles. It's formulated with a potent blend of 3% Glycolic Acid, Vitamin CG, and Niacinamide. Clinically proven to effectively diminish the look of dark circles, giving you a brighter, more refreshed look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Glycolic-Bright Eye Serum 20 ml**: 
â­ Apply under eyes every morning and night.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Glycolic-Bright Eye Serum 20 ml**: 
â­ Aqua / Water
â­ Niacinamide
â­ Glycerin
â­ Glycolic Acid
â­ Vitamin Cg
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ and other effective ingredients.

**Caution:** This product contains an Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) that may increase your skinâ€™s sensitivity to the sun. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.
#Loreal #Eyeserum #Skinbrightening #Skincare #Beauty #Makeup #Skincareroutine #HealthySkin #DarkCircles #KSA

description_en:
**Loreal Infallible Full Wear Concealer 329- Beige** is your ultimate solution for concealing blemishes, dark circles, and uneven skin tone.  With 8 shades available, you can find the perfect match for your skin, making it more than just a concealer. Its elastic, high-pigment formula provides full coverage with a lightweight feel.  Enjoy its ultra-long-wear (24 hours) with a natural matte finish that doesn't crease or settle into fine lines.  It features a super big applicator for easy and precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Infallible Full Wear Concealer 329- Beige**:
â­ Use a shade matching your skin tone to cover imperfections. 
â­ Use a shade one or two shades lighter to brighten under-eye dark circles. 
â­ Use a shade two to three shades darker to contour and add dimension to your face.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Infallible Full Wear Concealer 329- Beige**:

**Loreal Revitalift Laser Pure Retinol Serum 30 Ml** is a powerful nightly serum formulated with pure retinol to visibly reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. â­Reduces the look of wrinkles and fine lines. â­Improves skin texture and radiance. â­Brightens and evens skin tone. â­Deeply moisturizes the skin. â­Non-comedogenic (won't clog pores).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Revitalift Laser Pure Retinol Serum 30 Ml**: 
â­Apply to clean, dry skin in the evening. â­Always use a minimum of SPF 20 sunscreen in the morning. â­Start by applying twice a week, gradually increasing frequency as tolerated.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Revitalift Laser Pure Retinol Serum 30 Ml**: 
â­Water, â­Glycerin, â­Retinol, â­Hyaluronic Acid, â­Other soothing ingredients.

description_en:
**L'Oreal Infaillible Setting Spray Setting Mist 75ml** is the perfect setting spray to extend the wear of your makeup.  It prevents makeup transfer onto clothes and protects your makeup from water and sweat. It dries super-fast in just 3 seconds, leaving a light and non-sticky feel on your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Infaillible Setting Spray Setting Mist 75ml**:
â­ Apply makeup to skin and leave for 30 seconds.
â­ Shake the spray well before use.
â­ Hold 30cm away from your face, keeping your eyes and mouth closed.
â­ Spray in a circular motion for even distribution.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Infaillible Setting Spray Setting Mist 75ml**:
Please refer to product packaging for an accurate and up-to-date list of ingredients.

**Loreal Matte Resist Snooze 115** Discover L'Oreal Paris' new powdery matte liquid lipstick that lasts up to 16 hours. Transfer and smudge resistant for an all-day matte finish with a lightweight feel. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid. Get bold color payoff in one effortless swipe with a precise applicator. Available in a variety of irresistible shades. Find yours today!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Matte Resist Snooze 115**:
â­ Using the precise applicator, apply starting in the center of your upper lip.
â­ Work from the center to outer edges of your lips and then glide across the entire bottom lip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Matte Resist Snooze 115**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid

description_en:
**L'Oreal Infaillible Matte Resistance Liquid Lipstick, 601 Worth It**, a long-lasting, ultra-matte liquid lipstick that delivers intense color payoff and a comfortable, lightweight feel. Designed to stay put for up to 16 hours without smudging or fading, making it perfect for all-day wear. Its rich, high-pigment formula offers a smooth, even application, leaving lips with a bold, matte finish that resists transfer and smudging.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Infaillible Matte Resistance Liquid Lipstick, 601 Worth It**:
â­ Apply the liquid lipstick using the precision applicator, starting from the center of your upper lip and moving outward.
â­ Glide across your bottom lip to evenly distribute the color.
â­ Allow it to dry for a long-lasting finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Infaillible Matte Resistance Liquid Lipstick, 601 Worth It**:
(Ingredients may vary slightly from batch to batch. Please refer to the packaging for a complete ingredient list.)

**L'OrÃ©al Paris Paradise Plump Ambition Shade Nude Macaron 650** sets your Plump Ambition soaring with L'OrÃ©al Paris's new volumizing lip oil, delivering 24-hour hydration for lips that feel as good as they look. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Tripeptides, this gloss instantly smooths and plumps, unveiling a fuller-looking pout. Experience volumizing, glass-like shine in a lightweight, non-sticky formula, available in 7 shades. The innovative Cushiony Pillow Applicator, complete with massaging beads, caresses your lips for a truly luxurious and indulgent application, making every swipe a treat.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'OrÃ©al Paris Paradise Plump Ambition Shade Nude Macaron 650**
â­ Using the cushiony pillow applicator, apply starting in the center of your upper lip.
â­ Work from the center to outer edges of your lips and then glide across the entire bottom lip.
â­ Wait for gentle tingling sensation to subside to assess your glassy, plumper-looking lips!

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'OrÃ©al Paris Paradise Plump Ambition Shade Nude Macaron 650**
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Tripeptides

**Loreal Magic Retouch Golden Brown 75 ml** is the perfect solution for quick and easy grey hair coverage. â­ Perfect coverage for grey hair. â­ Suitable for all hair colours. â­ Lightweight formula that lasts until washed out. â­ Easy to use and perfect for travel. â­ Handy size fits in your bag. â­ Available in a range of colours to suit all tastes. â­ Ideal for use between hair colouring appointments. â­ Gives you a natural and perfect look. â­ Covers greys precisely and quickly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Magic Retouch Golden Brown 75 ml**:
â­ Hold the can 10-15cm from hair. â­ Spray roots lightly. â­ Leave for one minute to dry. â­ Wash out with shampoo.

description_en:
**L'Oreal Paris Infallible Full Wear Concealer 100 - Beige**, 24-hour full coverage! A new concealer from the Infallible range. Perfect for the eye area or the entire face, and sweat-resistant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Infallible Full Wear Concealer 100 - Beige**:
â­ Use a shade that matches your skin tone, apply a small dot to blemishes and blend with your finger or a brush.
â­ Use a shade lighter than your skin tone under the eyes to conceal dark circles.
â­ Use a shade two to three levels darker than your skin tone to contour and add dimension to your face.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Paris Infallible Full Wear Concealer 100 - Beige**:
â­ Polyethylene, cetearyl ethyl hexanoate, octyl dodecanol, dicalcium phosphate, nylon-12, aluminum starch octenyl succinate, silica, aqua / water, polyhydroxystearic acid, disteardimonium hectorite, talc, propylene carbonate, lecithin, tocopherol, ascorbyl palmitate, citric acid, [+/- may contain: ci 77491, ci 77492 / iron oxides, ci 77891 / titanium dioxide, ci 77510 / ferric ammonium ferrocyanide, ci 75470 / carmine, mica, ci 77266 [nano] / black 2 ].

description_en:
**Loreal Skin Expert Clay Exfoliating Gel Wash**, a pure clay cleanser that exfoliates and brightens your skin. For the first time, L'Oreal Paris laboratories have chosen three types of pure clay mixed with red algae in a non-drying exfoliating gel formula. For clean and soft skin every day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Skin Expert Clay Exfoliating Gel Wash**:
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount to wet face.
â­ Massage gently in small circular motions, emphasizing the forehead, nose, and chin.
â­ Avoid the eye area.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Suitable for combination to oily skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Skin Expert Clay Exfoliating Gel Wash**:
â­ Three types of pure clay (Kaolin, Montmorillonite, Ghassoul).
â­ Red Algae.

description_en:
**L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 4-5 Medium** is the perfect blend of skincare and makeup. Enjoy radiant, healthy-looking skin with a formula enriched with Pure Hyaluronic Acid, designed to hydrate and replump your skin. **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 4-5 Medium** provides light to medium coverage with a natural finish and a radiant glow.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 4-5 Medium**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply 2-3 drops onto your palm.
â­ Spread gently onto clean skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 4-5 Medium**:
â­ AQUA / WATER , ISODODECANE , DIMETHICONE , GLYCERIN , ALCOHOL DENAT. , BUTYLENE GLYCOL , TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE , PEG10 DIMETHICONE , PERLITE , POLYGLYCERYL10 LAURATE , CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE , SODIUM HYALURONATE , SILICA , ISOPROPYL LAUROYL SARCOSINATE , DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE , DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE , BISPEG/PPG14/14 DIMETHICONE , MAGNESIUM SULFATE , SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE , ETHYLHEXYL HYDROXYSTEARATE , PHENOXYETHANOL , DIPENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAHYDROXYSTEARATE TETRAISOSTEARATE , S I L I C A S I LY L A T E , DISODIUM STEAROYL G L U T A M A T E , T O C O P H E R O L , ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE , SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE , [+/ MAY CONTAIN: CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE , CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / IRON OXIDES , CI 77163 / BISMUTH OXYCHLORIDE]. (F.I.L. Z70026624/1)

**Loreal True Match Foundation - 1N - Ivory**, a perfect foundation that matches your skin tone and texture, providing flawless, natural coverage. Enriched with hyaluronic acid, it improves skin quality and gives a healthy radiance. It breaks the boundaries between skincare and makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal True Match Foundation - 1N - Ivory**:
â­ Dot the foundation onto cheeks, nose, chin, and forehead.
â­ Blend using fingers, a brush, or a sponge, towards the hairline and then downwards, starting with the T-zone.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal True Match Foundation - 1N - Ivory**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid

**Loreal Infallible Liquid Foundation 015- Beige**, want your foundation to last all day? Meet the new L'OrÃ©al Paris foundation, **Loreal Infallible Liquid Foundation 015- Beige**, for full coverage that lasts up to 24 hours. This foundation is transfer-proof and waterproof, perfect for everyday life and parties. Its lightweight and easy-to-apply formula provides full coverage without weighing down your skin. The innovative oxygen technology enhances a feeling of comfort and softness. A little goes a long way. Don't compromise on the lasting power of your makeup, choose **Loreal Infallible Liquid Foundation 015- Beige**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Infallible Liquid Foundation 015- Beige**:
â­ Apply a thin layer to your skin with clean fingertips.

title_en: **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 3-4 Light Medium**
title_ar: **Ù„ÙˆØ±ÙŠØ§Ù„ ØªØ±Ùˆ Ù…Ø§ØªØ´ Ù†ÙŠÙˆØ¯ Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… Ù…Ù„ÙˆÙ† ØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© Ø®ÙÙŠÙØ© ÙØ§ØªØ­ Ù…ØªÙˆØ³Ø·**
description_en:
**L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 3-4 Light Medium**, your favorite serum foundation, now with even stronger benefits! Enjoy the perfect blend of skincare and makeup, with stronger, deeper skincare features. Replenishes and restores your skin's elasticity in just 1 hour! This hydrating hyaluronic acid serum foundation smoothes, hydrates and replumps skin, while providing a radiant finish and coverage just like a foundation.

â­ Enriched with plumping microepidermic Pure Hyaluronic Acid, 50 times smaller than standard hyaluronic acid, resulting in deeper penetration.
â­ Naturally illuminates and evens out the skin and corrects imperfections, while making the skin look brighter and more radiant.
â­ Deeply hydrates and visibly replumps the skin.
â­ Proven to smooth skin overtime.
â­ Lightweight.
â­ Seamlessly adapts to your skin tone and texture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 3-4 Light Medium**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before using.
â­ Apply 2-3 drops on your palms.
â­ Spread gently with your fingers, just like you would use your daily serum, on clean skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 3-4 Light Medium**:
â­ AQUA / WATER , ISODODECANE , DIMETHICONE , GLYCERIN , ALCOHOL DENAT. , BUTYLENE GLYCOL , TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE , PEG10 DIMETHICONE , PERLITE , POLYGLYCERYL10 LAURATE , CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE , SODIUM HYALURONATE , SILICA , ISOPROPYL LAUROYL SARCOSINATE , DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE , DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE , BISPEG/PPG14/14 DIMETHICONE , MAGNESIUM SULFATE , SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE , ETHYLHEXYL HYDROXYSTEARATE , PHENOXYETHANOL , DIPENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAHYDROXYSTEARATE TETRAISOSTEARATE , S I L I C A S I LY L A T E , DISODIUM STEAROYL G L U T A M A T E , T O C O P H E R O L , ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE , SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE , [+/ MAY CONTAIN: CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE , CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / IRON OXIDES , CI 77163 / BISMUTH OXYCHLORIDE]. (F.I.L. Z70026624/1)

**Loreal True Match Foundation Rose 2R/2C- Vanilla**: Discover the perfect foundation that matches your skin tone perfectly. Its unique formula provides perfect and natural coverage, giving you radiant and healthy-looking skin. Enriched with hyaluronic acid, **Loreal True Match Foundation Rose 2R/2C- Vanilla** improves your skin quality and gives it a natural glow. This foundation breaks the boundaries between skincare and makeup, offering skincare benefits with perfect coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal True Match Foundation Rose 2R/2C- Vanilla**:
â­ Dot foundation onto cheeks, nose, chin, and forehead.
â­ Blend using fingers, a foundation brush, or a makeup sponge.
â­ Blend outwards towards the hairline and then downwards, starting with the T-zone.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal True Match Foundation Rose 2R/2C- Vanilla**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Glycerin
â­ Aloe Vera Extract
â­ Vitamin E

description_en:
**L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 2-3 Light**, your favorite serum foundation, now with even stronger benefits! Enjoy the perfect blend of skincare and makeup, with stronger, deeper skincare features, replumping your skin in just 1 hour!

â­ Hydrating hyaluronic acid serum foundation that smoothes, hydrates, and replumps skin like a serum.
â­ Gives your skin a radiant finish and coverage just like a foundation.
â­ Enriched with plumping microepidermic Pure Hyaluronic Acid, 50 times smaller than standard hyaluronic acid, resulting in deeper penetration.
â­ Naturally illuminates and evens out skin tone, corrects imperfections, while making skin look brighter and more radiant.
â­ Deeply hydrates and visibly replumps the skin.
â­ Proven to smoothen skin over time.
â­ Lightweight.
â­ Seamlessly adapts to your skin tone and texture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 2-3 Light**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before using.
â­ Apply 2-3 drops to your palms.
â­ Spread lightly with your fingers, just like you would use your daily serum, on clean skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 2-3 Light**:
â­ AQUA / WATER , ISODODECANE , DIMETHICONE , GLYCERIN , ALCOHOL DENAT. , BUTYLENE GLYCOL , TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE , PEG10 DIMETHICONE , PERLITE , POLYGLYCERYL10 LAURATE , CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE , SODIUM HYALURONATE , SILICA , ISOPROPYL LAUROYL SARCOSINATE , DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE , DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE , BISPEG/PPG14/14 DIMETHICONE , MAGNESIUM SULFATE , SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE , ETHYLHEXYL HYDROXYSTEARATE , PHENOXYETHANOL , DIPENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAHYDROXYSTEARATE TETRAISOSTEARATE , S I L I C A S I LY L A T E , DISODIUM STEAROYL G L U T A M A T E , T O C O P H E R O L , ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE , SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE , [+/ MAY CONTAIN: CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE , CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / IRON OXIDES , CI 77163 / BISMUTH OXYCHLORIDE]. (F.I.L. Z70026624/1)

title_ar: Ù„ÙˆØ±ÙŠØ§Ù„ Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ù…Ø·ÙÙŠ Ø§Ù†ÙØ§Ù„Ø¨ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ø§Øª 230
description_en:
**Loreal Matte Resist Shopping Spree 230** - Discover L'Oreal Paris' new powdery matte liquid lipstick that lasts up to 16 hours. Transfer and smudge resistant for an all-day matte finish with a lightweight feel. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid. Get bold color payoff in one effortless swipe with a precise applicator. Available in a variety of irresistible shades. Find yours today!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Matte Resist Shopping Spree 230**:
â­ Using the precise applicator, apply starting in the center of your upper lip.
â­ Work from the center to the outer edges of your lips and then glide across the entire bottom lip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Matte Resist Shopping Spree 230**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ High-quality pigments for bold, long-lasting color

title_en: **Loreal Cr Slim Matte Intense 129 I Lead** Luxury Lipstick
title_ar: **Ù„ÙˆØ±ÙŠØ§Ù„ Ø³ÙŠ Ø¢Ø± Ø³Ù„ÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø·ÙÙŠ Ø¥Ù†ØªÙ†Ø³ 129 Ø¢ÙŠ Ù„ÙŠØ¯** Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ ÙØ§Ø®Ø±
description_en:
**Loreal Cr Slim Matte Intense 129 I Lead** is a luxurious lipstick that gives you full and soft lips. Its rich formula with hyaluronic acid and argan oil provides all-day hydration. It is characterized by its intense color and long-lasting power of up to 16 hours. Its elegant design and vibrant colors make it perfect for every woman. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Cr Slim Matte Intense 129 I Lead**: 
â­ Apply **Loreal Cr Slim Matte Intense 129 I Lead** from the center of your upper lips and then glide it to the edges. 
â­ Repeat the same procedure with your lower lips. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Cr Slim Matte Intense 129 I Lead**:
â­ DIMETHICONE
â­ BIS-DIGLYCERYL POLYACYLADIPATE-2
â­ PHENYL TRIMETHICONE

**Loreal Infallible Liquid Foundation 140- Beige** provides full coverage, waterproof, long-lasting wear. Its oxygen-rich formula feels lightweight on your skin.

â­ Start with one pump of product.

â­ For longer-lasting coverage, use a makeup primer (sold separately).

description_en:
**Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 135- Beige** is your new go-to for a flawless, all-day matte look. This long-lasting foundation provides 24-hour matte coverage with a natural, second-skin finish.  Its unique formula, with an ultra-blurring serum and highly mattifying powders, delivers sweat-proof, heat-proof, transfer-proof, and waterproof coverage.  **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 135- Beige** gives you full coverage with a comfortable feel, plus SPF 18 sun protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 135- Beige**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount to the back of your hand.
â­ Blend onto your face using your fingertips or a makeup brush.
â­ Start with areas needing more coverage and blend outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 135- Beige**:
(Full ingredient list will be provided here when available)

**L'OrÃ©al Paris Paradise Plump Ambition Shade Rouge in Love 380** delivers luscious, fuller-looking lips with 24-hour hydration.  Achieve naturally plump lips with this unique lip balm. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'OrÃ©al Paris Paradise Plump Ambition Shade Rouge in Love 380**: 
â­ Apply using the comfortable applicator, starting from the center of your upper lip.

â­ Wait for the slight tingling sensation to subside. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'OrÃ©al Paris Paradise Plump Ambition Shade Rouge in Love 380**:

**L'Oreal Paris Glotion Lumi Le Liquid Blush - Glowy Berry Glow 645** delivers a captivating, radiant blush glow with its innovative, lightweight formula and powerful pigment.  It features a vibrant pop of color and buildable intensity for customizable looks. Easy to apply with fingertips, a sponge, or a brush, itâ€™s perfect for all makeup skill levels.  Achieve a healthy, glowing complexion suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Glotion Lumi Le Liquid Blush - Glowy Berry Glow 645**:
â­ Gently remove excess product from the applicator.
â­ Apply 1-3 dots to each cheek using the doe-foot applicator.
â­ Gently pat into skin with fingertips for a seamless finish.
â­ Repeat steps 2 and 3 to build desired color and coverage.
â­ Apply to the bridge of your nose for a soft flush.

(Ingredient list varies; please refer to packaging for complete list)

**L'OrÃ©al Paris Paradise Plump Ambition Shade Latte Glace 641** unleashes your plump ambition with L'OrÃ©al Paris's new volumizing lip oil. Get 24-hour hydration for lips that feel as good as they look. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Tripeptides, it instantly smooths and plumps for a fuller pout. Experience volumizing, glass-like shine in a lightweight, non-sticky formula, available in 7 stunning shades. The luxurious Cushiony Pillow Applicator, with massaging beads, provides a truly luxurious and indulgent application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'OrÃ©al Paris Paradise Plump Ambition Shade Latte Glace 641**
â­ Using the cushiony pillow applicator, start from the center of your upper lip.

â­ Wait for the gentle tingling sensation to subside, then enjoy fuller, glass-like shine!

**L'OrÃ©al Paris Paradise Plump Ambition Shade Cristal Clear 101** sets your Plump Ambition soaring with L'OrÃ©al Paris's new volumizing lip oil, delivering 24-hour hydration for lips that feel as good as they look. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Tripeptides, this gloss instantly smooths and plumps, unveiling a fuller-looking pout. Experience volumizing, glass-like shine in a lightweight, non-sticky formula, available in 7 shades. The innovative Cushiony Pillow Applicator, complete with massaging beads, caresses your lips for a truly luxurious and indulgent application, making every swipe a treat.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'OrÃ©al Paris Paradise Plump Ambition Shade Cristal Clear 101**
â­ Using the cushiony pillow applicator, apply starting in the center of your upper lip.
â­ Work from the center to outer edges of your lips and then glide across the entire bottom lip.
â­ Wait for gentle tingling sensation to subside to assess your glassy, plumper-looking lips!

description_en:
**L'Oreal Paris Glotion Lumi Le Liquid Blush - Glowy Rouge Paris 640** unlocks a captivating, radiant blush glow. Its innovative, lightweight formula and powerful pigments deliver a luminous pop of color, brightening your complexion with a comfortable feel and buildable intensity for customizable looks.  Easy to blend, it applies effortlessly with fingertips, a sponge, or a brush, suitable for all makeup skill levels.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Glotion Lumi Le Liquid Blush - Glowy Rouge Paris 640**:
â­ Gently remove excess product from applicator.
â­ Use the doe-foot applicator and place 1-3 dots on each cheek.
â­ Use fingertips and gently pat into skin for a seamless finish.
â­ Build blush to desired level of color and coverage by repeating steps 2 and 3.
â­ Apply to the tip and bridge of your nose for a soft flush.

description_en:
**Loreal Revitalift Laser X3 Serum 30 ml** effectively fights the signs of aging. â­Targets wrinkles and improves skin firmness and texture. â­Its scientifically-backed formula works in three ways to re-plump, re-firm, and refine your skin, leaving a smooth and balanced complexion. â­In just four weeks, you'll notice a visible improvement in your skin's texture, looking more radiant and youthful. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Revitalift Laser X3 Serum 30 ml**: â­Apply the serum daily with upward movements on your thoroughly cleansed face and neck. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Revitalift Laser X3 Serum 30 ml**: â­Hyaluronic Acid: An effective moisturizer naturally found in the skin; it stimulates cell production to plump the skin and reduce the appearance of wrinkles. â­Pro-Xylane 3%: Supports the skin with its powerful anti-aging properties; improves elasticity, giving you a more youthful and radiant look.

**Loreal Infallible Liquid Foundation 200- Beige**: Want your foundation to last as long as you? Meet **Loreal Infallible Liquid Foundation** for a full coverage, no-compromise base for ultimate resistance. With a new standard in longwear coverage, it's transfer-proof, life-proof, party-proof, and waterproof, so you get more from your makeup.  This freshwear foundation means longwear no longer equals thick and heavy coverage. The innovative oxygen technology gives a lightweight feel, while the ultra-stretchable formula ensures full coverage applicationâ€”a little goes a long way. Life doesn't compromise, so now your makeup doesn't either. For unstoppable resistance in unstoppable situations for unstoppable women.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Infallible Liquid Foundation 200- Beige**:
â­ Glide onto skin with clean fingertips.
â­ Apply in a rolling motion.
â­ Prime your base before applying foundation.
â­ Wear for up to 24 hours.

description_en:
**L'Oreal Infaillible Matte Resistance Liquid 625 S Fling 5ml** is a long-lasting, ultra-matte liquid lipstick that provides intense color payoff and a comfortable, lightweight feel. Designed to stay put for up to 16 hours without smudging or fading.  Its formula is enriched with high-pigment color, offering a smooth, even application, leaving lips with a bold, matte finish that resists transfer and smudge.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Infaillible Matte Resistance Liquid 625 S Fling 5ml**:
â­ Apply the liquid lipstick using the precision applicator, starting from the center of your upper lip and moving outward.
â­ Glide across your bottom lip to fill in the color.
â­ Allow it to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Infaillible Matte Resistance Liquid 625 S Fling 5ml**:
â­ (Full ingredient list will be updated later)

description_en:
**Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 155- Beige**, a long-lasting foundation that provides 24-hour matte coverage with a natural finish.  It's formulated with an ultra-blurring serum and highly mattifying powders to deliver flawless coverage that's sweat-proof, heat-proof, waterproof, and transfer-proof. Enjoy a perfect complexion all day long with **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 155- Beige**. Contains SPF 18.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 155- Beige**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount to the back of your hand.
â­ Gently blend onto your face using your fingertips or a makeup brush.
â­ Start in areas needing more coverage, then blend outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 155- Beige**:
â­ (Full ingredient list will be added here when available)

description_en:
**L'Oreal Infallible Semi Permanent Powder 140 Golden Beige** is a foundation powder that covers and lasts like a liquid foundation. â­ Medium to full buildable coverage. â­ Seamless soft matte finish. â­ Sweat, water, heat & humidity proof. â­ Easily blendable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Infallible Semi Permanent Powder 140 Golden Beige**: â­ Apply the powder to your face and blend with your fingertips, a sponge, or a foundation brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Infallible Semi Permanent Powder 140 Golden Beige**: â­ Aqua / water, dimethicone, isododecane, alcohol denat., ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, trimethylsiloxysilicate, butylene glycol, titanium dioxide, peg-10 dimethicone, perlite, synthetic fluorphlogopite, nylon-12, isopropyl lauroyl sarcosinate, diisopropyl sebacate, hdi/trimethylol hexyllactone crosspolymer, disteardimonium hectorite, bis-peg/ppg-14/14 dimethicone, magnesium sulfate, aluminum hydroxide, phenoxyethanol, disodium stearoyl glutamate, hydrogen dimethicone, cellulose, dipentaerythrityl tetrahydroxystearate/tetraisostearate, silica silylate, parfum / fragrance, calcium aluminum borosilicate, tocopherol, silica, hexyl cinnamal, benzyl salicylate, bht, linalool, alpha-isomethyl ionone, benzyl alcohol, citronellol. (+1- may contain: ci 77891 / titanium dioxide, ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 / iron oxides, ci 77510 / ferric ammonium ferrocyanide).
