**L'Oreal Infaillible Matte Resistance Liquid 630 Rose** is a long-lasting, ultra-matte liquid lipstick that provides intense color payoff and a comfortable, lightweight feel. Perfect for all-day wear, it stays put for up to 16 hours without smudging or fading. Its formula is enriched with high-pigment color, offering a smooth, even application that leaves lips with a bold, matte finish that resists transfer and smudging.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Infaillible Matte Resistance Liquid 630 Rose**:
â­ Apply the liquid lipstick using the precision applicator, starting from the center of your upper lip and moving outward.
â­ Glide across the bottom lip to fill in the color.
â­ Allow the lipstick to dry for a long-lasting, smudge-proof finish.

**Loreal Pure Clay Mask Clears Blackheads 50 ml** is a luxurious face mask enriched with pure clays and marine algae extract, sourced from the nutrient-rich French coast. â­ Clears blackheads and shrinks pores. â­ Delivers instant and long-lasting visible results. â­ Immediate results: skin is neat, perfectly clean, clear, and less oily. â­ 1-week results: pores are less visible, decongested, and shrunk. â­ Continued use: blackheads are less visible, and skin texture is visibly transformed.

description_en:
**L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum Shade Light Medium 3-4** delivers a flawless, naturally radiant look. Powered by 1% Hyaluronic Acid, it deeply hydrates your skin while providing light, even coverage suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum Shade Light Medium 3-4**:
â­ Use the dropper to pick up serum, wiping off any excess inside the bottle.
â­ Apply a few drops to your skin and blend using your fingertips or a makeup blending tool.
â­ Add additional layers to achieve your desired coverage, then gently pat to set your makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum Shade Light Medium 3-4**:
â­ 1% Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Other ingredients to ensure optimal hydration and coverage.

**Important Notes:**
â­ Avoid eye contact. Rinse immediately if contact occurs.
â­ Patch test before use to check for skin sensitivity.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place.

description_en:
**Loreal Matte Resist Afterwork 425**: Discover L'Oreal Paris' new luxurious matte liquid lipstick that lasts up to 16 hours. Transfer and smudge-proof for an all-day matte finish with a lightweight feel. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid. Get bold color payoff in one effortless swipe with a precise applicator. Available in captivating shades. Find your perfect shade today!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Matte Resist Afterwork 425**:
â­ Using the precise applicator, apply starting in the center of your upper lip.
â­ Work from the center to the outer edges of your lips, then glide across your entire bottom lip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Matte Resist Afterwork 425**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ High-quality pigments
â­ Moisturizing ingredients

**Loreal Infaillible 24h Fresh Wear Foundation Powder - 180 Rose Sand** offers flawless, long-lasting coverage.  Achieve a natural, soft-matte look with buildable medium to full coverage. **Loreal Infaillible 24h Fresh Wear Foundation Powder - 180 Rose Sand** is sweat-proof, water-proof, and heat & humidity proof, ensuring your makeup stays put all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Infaillible 24h Fresh Wear Foundation Powder - 180 Rose Sand**: 
â­ Apply to skin using the included sponge applicator.
â­ Use wet for full coverage or dry for medium, buildable coverage. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Infaillible 24h Fresh Wear Foundation Powder - 180 Rose Sand**:
â­ Talc
â­ Zinc Stearate
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Corn Starch
â­ and more effective ingredients. (Please refer to product packaging for the full list).

**L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum** Shade Rosy Light 1-2, a unique tinted serum that gives you a flawless, naturally radiant look. Powered by 1% Hyaluronic Acid, it deeply hydrates your skin and provides light, even coverage suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin. It illuminates your skin, corrects imperfections, evens skin tone, and instantly hydrates. Easy and precise application thanks to the convenient pipette.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum**: 
â­ Use the dropper to pick up serum, wiping off any excess inside the bottle.
â­ Apply a few drops to your skin and blend using your fingertips or a makeup blender.
â­ Add additional layers as desired, then gently press to set your makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum**: (Full ingredient list available on packaging)
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Moisturizing Ingredients
â­ Light Coverage Ingredients

description_en:
**Loreal Glycolic Bright Tissue Mask Serum**, created by L'OrÃ©al Paris Skincare Laboratories for instant radiance. Proven to visibly reduce dark spots and instantly brighten skin. Contains our highest concentration of brightening ingredients, nourishes and leaves skin looking even. Glycolic acid, the lightest weight amongst all brightening Alpha Hydroxy Acids, is absorbed deeply to gently exfoliate for improved skin rejuvenation. **Loreal Glycolic Bright Tissue Mask Serum** targets four dimensions of glow:

â­ Visibly reduces dark spots
â­ Visibly reduces imperfections
â­ Evens skin tone
â­ Improves radiance

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Glycolic Bright Tissue Mask Serum**:
â­ Unfold mask and remove mesh layer.
â­ Apply to face, leave on for 15 minutes.
â­ Remove mask and gently massage excess serum into skin or use a cotton pad to remove.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Glycolic Bright Tissue Mask Serum**:
â­ Aqua / Water, Glycerine, Betaine, Rhamnose, Caproyl, Salicylic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phenylethyl Resorcinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Glyceryl Isostearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Hexyldecanol, Myristic Acid, Palmitic Acid, PEG-100 Stearate, Stearic Acid, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Alumina, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Silica, Parfum / Fragrance.

**Loreal Matte Resist Wine Not 500** - Discover L'Oreal Paris' new powdery matte liquid lipstick that lasts up to 16hr. **L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum** Shade Light 2-3: Unleash a flawless, naturally radiant look with this luxurious tinted serum. Powered by 1% Hyaluronic Acid, it deeply hydrates your skin while providing light, even coverage. It illuminates, corrects imperfections, evens, brightens, and instantly hydrates your skin for a healthy, radiant glow. Easy to use with its convenient pipette applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum**: 
â­ Use the dropper to pick up serum, wiping off any excess.
â­ Apply a few drops to your skin, using your hands or a makeup blender.
â­ Spread the serum evenly, adding additional layers as desired.
â­ Gently blend until you achieve a smooth, even finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum**: (Ingredients may vary by shade; please refer to the packaging for the full list)
â­ Hyaluronic Acid

**Loreal Foundation Infaillible 260- Beige** is a freshwear liquid foundation that provides full coverage that lasts all day long. Thanks to the innovative oxygen technology, you'll get a lightweight feel with a flawless finish. This foundation is transfer-proof, life-proof, party-proof, and waterproof. **Loreal Foundation Infaillible 260- Beige** is available in 29 shades to suit all skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Foundation Infaillible 260- Beige**
â­ Prime your face before applying foundation.
â­ Apply the foundation with clean fingertips using a rolling motion.
â­ Let it dry before applying other makeup.
â­ Lasts up to 24 hours.

**L'Oreal Infallible Semi Permanent Powder 120 Warm Vanilla** provides all-day flawless matte coverage.  This buildable powder foundation is suitable for all skin types, offering a seamless, natural-looking finish. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Infallible Semi Permanent Powder 120 Warm Vanilla**:
â­ Apply the powder to your face using a makeup sponge or brush.
â­ Build coverage by applying thin layers as desired.
â­ Can be used over foundation or on its own.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Infallible Semi Permanent Powder 120 Warm Vanilla**:
â­ Aqua / water, dimethicone, isododecane, alcohol denat., ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, trimethylsiloxysilicate, butylene glycol, titanium dioxide, peg-10 dimethicone, perlite, synthetic fluorphlogopite, nylon-12, isopropyl lauroyl sarcosinate, diisopropyl sebacate, hdi/trimethylol hexyllactone crosspolymer, disteardimonium hectorite, bis-peg/ppg-14/14 dimethicone, magnesium sulfate, aluminum hydroxide, phenoxyethanol, disodium stearoyl glutamate, hydrogen dimethicone, cellulose, dipentaerythrityl tetrahydroxystearate/tetraisostearate, silica silylate, parfum / fragrance, tocopherol, silica, hexyl cinnamal, benzyl salicylate, bht, linalool, alpha-isomethyl ionone, benzyl alcohol, citronellol. description_en:
**L'Oreal Paris Glotion Lumi Le Liquid Blush - Warm Peach 627** unlocks a captivating, radiant blush glow with its innovative, lightweight formula and powerful pigment. Delivering a luminous pop of color, it brightens the complexion with a comfortable feel and buildable intensity for customizable looks.  Its seamless blendability allows for easy application with fingertips, a sponge, or a brush, providing a healthy, glowing complexion for all makeup skill levels.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Glotion Lumi Le Liquid Blush - Warm Peach 627**:
â­ Gently remove excess product from applicator.
â­ Use the doe-foot applicator and place 1-3 dots on each cheek.
â­ Use fingertips and gently pat into skin for a seamless finish.
â­ Build blush to desired level of color and coverage by repeating steps 2 and 3.
â­ Apply to the tip and bridge of your nose for a soft flush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Paris Glotion Lumi Le Liquid Blush - Warm Peach 627**:
(Ingredients may vary slightly from batch to batch.  Please refer to packaging for accurate ingredient list.)

title_en: **Moov Head Lice Shampoo 200 ml**
title_ar: **Ù…ÙˆÙˆÙ Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù„Ù‚ØªÙ„ Ù‚Ù…Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø£Ø³ 200 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Moov Head Lice Shampoo 200 ml** is the perfect solution to get rid of pesky head lice. This shampoo is a clinically proven, safe and effective formula, specially designed to eliminate lice and their eggs efficiently. Easy to use and offers comprehensive treatment without the need for extra hair washing. **Moov Head Lice Shampoo 200 ml**'s formula is gentle on the scalp, leaving hair soft and shiny. Goodbye head lice, hello healthy and beautiful hair!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Moov Head Lice Shampoo 200 ml**:
â­ Ensure your hair is completely dry before use.
â­ Divide your hair into sections, apply the shampoo generously to the scalp and hair.
â­ Cover your hair with a shower cap and leave it for 15 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water and condition.
â­ Repeat the process weekly for at least two weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Moov Head Lice Shampoo 200 ml**:
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ PEG-120 Methyl Glucose
â­ Cocamide DEA
â­ Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit/Seed Oil
â­ Glycerin
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Polyquaternium-44
â­ Citric Acid.

#Moov #HeadLiceShampoo #LiceTreatment #HealthyHair #HairBeauty #NoChemicals #NaturalIngredients #HairCare #Loreal #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**L'Oreal Paris Infallible Gel Auto Liner Blue Jersey 260** delivers effortless precision and long-lasting wear. Its intense color and smudge-proof formula create a captivating eye look that lasts all day. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Infallible Gel Auto Liner Blue Jersey 260**:
â­ Start by applying a thin line from the inner corner of your eye to the outer corner.
â­ Gently smudge any uneven lines with a small brush.
â­ Use on both upper and lower eyelids for a more dramatic look.
â­ For a more intense color payoff, apply thin coats.

description_en:
**Loreal Infallible Full Wear Concealer 338- Maroon** is your ultimate solution for concealing blemishes, dark circles, and uneven skin tone. Available in 8 shades to brighten, correct, contour, and highlight. Its elastic, high-pigment formula provides full coverage with a lightweight feel.  Enjoy ultra-long wear and a matte finish that doesn't crease or settle into fine lines. It comes with a super-sized applicator for easy and precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Infallible Full Wear Concealer 338- Maroon**:
â­ Use a shade that matches your skin tone to cover blemishes.
â­ Use a shade lighter than your skin tone under the eyes to conceal dark circles.
â­ Use a shade two to three levels darker than your skin tone to contour your face.

description_en:
**L'Oreal Paris Glotion Lumi Le Liquid Blush - Worth It Medium 635** unlocks a captivating, radiant blush glow with its innovative, lightweight formula and powerful pigment. Delivering a luminous pop of color, it brightens the complexion with a comfortable feel and buildable intensity for customizable looks. Its seamless blendability allows for easy application with fingertips, a sponge, or a brush, providing a healthy, glowing complexion for all makeup skill levels.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Glotion Lumi Le Liquid Blush - Worth It Medium 635**:
â­ Gently remove excess product from applicator.
â­ Use the doe-foot applicator and place 1-3 dots on each cheek.
â­ Use fingertips and gently pat into skin for a seamless finish.
â­ Build blush to desired level of color and coverage by repeating steps 2 and 3.
â­ Apply to the tip and bridge of your nose for a soft flush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Paris Glotion Lumi Le Liquid Blush - Worth It Medium 635**:
(Ingredients may vary depending on shade. Please refer to the packaging for a full ingredient list.)

description_en:
**Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 175- Beige**: Achieve a flawless, long-lasting look with **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 175- Beige**. This foundation provides a smooth, full coverage finish with a natural, second-skin feel that lasts up to 24 hours.  Formulated with highly mattifying powders, it ensures oil and shine control throughout the day. **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 175- Beige** gives you perfect coverage without feeling heavy on your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 175- Beige**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount to the back of your hand.
â­ Gently blend onto your face using your fingertips or a makeup brush.

description_en:
**Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 110- Beige** offers flawless, long-lasting coverage. This matte foundation provides full coverage that lasts up to 24 hours with a natural finish.  Formulated with highly mattifying powders and a blurring serum, it delivers sweat-proof, heat-proof, and transfer-proof coverage. Contains SPF 18.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 110- Beige**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply a small amount to the back of your hand and gently blend onto your face using your fingertips or a makeup brush.
â­ Start in areas needing more coverage and blend outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 110- Beige**:(Ingredients may vary by shade; see packaging for full list)
â­ High-coverage mattifying ingredients.
â­ Highly mattifying powders for long-lasting wear.
â­ Blurring serum for a smooth, natural finish.
â­ SPF 18 sun protection.

description_en:
**Loreal Browartist Leskinny Nu 109 Ebony- Dark**: Bored of sparse, unshapely brows? Meet the NEW **Loreal Browartist Leskinny Nu 109 Ebony- Dark** for a natural, defined brow look. No brow tints or microblading needed, the ultra-skinny 1.5mm tip creates hair-like strokes for brows that look just like yours! Use the retractable pencil for mistake-proof application and finish with the spoolie brush for naturally filled yet defined brows. Available in 6 shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Browartist Leskinny Nu 109 Ebony- Dark**:
â­ Begin with clean eyebrows and start where your brows are more sparse.
â­ Apply in upward motions to create hair-like strokes.
â­ Blend it in with the spoolie.
â­ To set your eyebrows, apply Brow Artist Plump and Set.

Tested on 103 women to guarantee maximum matte coverage all day long. Surprisingly natural! Enjoy all the advantages of a waterproof foundation with maximum matte coverage that lasts all day. This foundation features a lightweight, natural texture and provides a 24-hour matte finish with shine control.  Its high concentration of pigments in an ultra-fluid texture results in high coverage with a second-skin finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 145 - Beige**
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Dot this waterproof foundation onto cheeks, nose, chin, and forehead.
â­ Using fingers, a brush, or a makeup sponge, blend the foundation out towards the hairline and down.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Paris Infaillible Matte Cover Foundation 145 - Beige**
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU
â­ DIMETHICONE
â­ ISODODECANE
â­ NYLON-12
â­ ACRYLATES/POLYTRIMETHYLSILOXYMETHACRYLATE COPOLYMER
â­ SILICA
â­ BUTYLENE GLYCOL
â­ PEG-19

**L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum, Shade 5-6 Medium Tan** is a luxurious foundation that combines skincare and makeup flawlessly. Enjoy radiant, healthy-looking skin with a formula enriched with Pure Hyaluronic Acid, designed to hydrate and replump your skin. **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum** provides light-to-medium coverage, gently concealing imperfections while leaving your skin looking luminous and smooth. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum**: 
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply 2-3 drops to your palm.
â­ Gently spread onto your clean skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum**: 
â­ Water
â­ Isododecane
â­ Glycerin
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ And other ingredients.

description_en:
**Loreal Waterproof Paradise Mascara** will take your lashes to paradise! â­ Enriched with lash-loving castor oil. â­ Provides intense volume and spectacular length. â­ Feather-soft feel, flake-free formula. â­ Ultra-soft brush for easy and precise application. â­ Suitable for sensitive eyes. â­ Waterproof for all-day wear. â­ Controllable intensity, from natural to dramatic. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Waterproof Paradise Mascara**: 
â­ Step 1: Apply mascara from the base of the eyelashes to the tips, in zigzag movements. 
â­ Step 2: Repeat application until desired effect is achieved. 
â­ Step 3: For an intense and defined look, apply mascara to lower lashes as well.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Waterproof Paradise Mascara**: 
â­ Castor Oil â­ Other ingredients to enhance volume, length, and smoothness.

**Loreal Infallible Bronzer 250** is a must-have for beauty enthusiasts. This high-quality bronzer adds a warm, sun-kissed glow to your complexion. Its lightweight formula blends seamlessly into the skin for a natural, radiant look. The compact size makes it perfect for touch-ups on the go.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Infallible Bronzer 250**:

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Infallible Bronzer 250**:
â­ Talc
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate
â­ Silica
â­ Zinc Stearate
â­ Potassium Sorbate

description_en:
**L'Oreal Paris Infallible Gel Auto Liner Intense 260 - Black**, experience the precise and effortless application of L'OrÃ©al Paris's liquid gel eyeliner. Enjoy beautifully defined lines that last all day and are waterproof.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Infallible Gel Auto Liner Intense 260 - Black**:
â­ Start from the inner corner of your eye and draw a thin line towards the outer corner.
â­ It can be used on the upper or lower eyelid.
â­ Gently wipe away any mistakes using a damp cotton swab.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Paris Infallible Gel Auto Liner Intense 260 - Black**:
â­Dimethicone trimethylsiloxysilicate, polyethylene acrylates, polyisobutene, alumina, kaolin, disteardimonium hectorite, pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, tin oxide, propylene carbonate, polyglyceryl-3, polydimethylsiloxyethyl dimethicone, maltodextrin. May contain: iron oxides, titanium dioxide, ultramarines, manganese violet, ferric ammonium ferrocyanide, black 2, carmine, ferric ferrocyanide, yellow 5 lake, blue 1 lake.

**Loreal True Match Foundation 4N- Beige**: Rediscover the perfect match with **Loreal True Match Foundation 4N- Beige** from L'Oreal Paris. Designed to perfectly suit your skin tone and type, this foundation provides flawless, natural coverage for a radiant, healthy complexion.  Enriched with hyaluronic acid, it improves skin quality and provides hydration. **Loreal True Match Foundation 4N- Beige** seamlessly blends skincare benefits with exceptional makeup performance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal True Match Foundation 4N- Beige**:

title_ar: **Ù„ÙˆØ±ÙŠØ§Ù„ Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø³Ø§Ø³ Ø§Ù†ÙØ§Ù„ÙŠØ¨Ù„ 24 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø© 220 Ø³Ø§Ù†Ø¯**
description_en:
**L'Oreal Infallible Semi Permanent Powder 220 Sand**: Discover the new **L'Oreal Infallible** powder foundation, designed to last for a full 24 hours!  Get flawless, long-lasting coverage like a liquid foundation, with a matte finish and no cakiness. This powder is infused with ultra-fine adhesive pigments, ensuring all-day wear. It's easily blendable and gives your skin a natural, seamless soft matte look. Sweat-proof, water-proof, heat & humidity proof. Medium to full coverage, buildable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Infallible Semi Permanent Powder 220 Sand**:
â­ Apply the powder to your face and blend using your fingertips, a sponge, or a makeup brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Infallible Semi Permanent Powder 220 Sand**:
â­Aqua / water, dimethicone, isododecane, alcohol denat., ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, trimethylsiloxysilicate, butylene glycol, titanium dioxide, peg-10 dimethicone, perlite, synthetic fluorphlogopite, nylon-12, isopropyl lauroyl sarcosinate, diisopropyl sebacate, hdi/trimethylol hexyllactone crosspolymer, disteardimonium hectorite, bis-peg/ppg-14/14 dimethicone, magnesium sulfate, aluminum hydroxide, phenoxyethanol, disodium stearoyl glutamate, hydrogen dimethicone, cellulose, dipentaerythrityl tetrahydroxystearate/tetraisostearate, silica silylate, parfum / fragrance, tocopherol, silica, hexyl cinnamal, benzyl salicylate, bht, linalool, alpha-isomethyl ionone, benzyl alcohol, citronellol. (+/- may contain ci 77891 / titanium dioxide, ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 / iron oxides, ci 77510 / ferric ammonium ferrocyanide).

description_en:
**L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum Shade Very Light 0.5-2**: Unleash a flawless, naturally radiant look with **L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum Shade Very Light 0.5-2**, powered by 1% Hyaluronic Acid. This innovative serum plumps your skin with a surge of moisture while providing light, even coverage that's gentle enough for all skin types, even sensitive. Watch as it effortlessly illuminates your skin, corrects imperfections, and instantly evens, brightens, and hydrates, leaving you with a healthy, radiant glow, all delivered with precision through its convenient pipette applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'OrÃ©al Paris 24H Infallible Tinted Serum Shade Very Light 0.5-2**:

**Loreal True Match** Compact Powder Foundation C3 - Beige: Perfectly matches your skin's colour and texture for a flawless finish.  Fine, soft and lightweight powder blends seamlessly with your complexion. Ultra-fine formula: Application can be a single translucent layer to even the complexion or build up more coverage to cover imperfections. Jet fusion technology: Powder is 40 percent finer and hence gives a super even finish. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal True Match**: 
â­ Use a light touch and the provided applicator, sweep all over the face for a natural look. 
â­ Perfect for setting makeup and/or concealer. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal True Match**: 
â­ Skin tone enhancing pearl pigments. 
â­ Oil-free and non-comedogenic.

**Loreal Browartist Leskinny Nu 107 Cool Bru- Light** delivers naturally defined brows effortlessly. This brow pencil gives you a flawless brow look without the need for tints or complex techniques. Its innovative ultra-skinny 1.5mm tip creates precise, hair-like strokes for a completely natural result.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Browartist Leskinny Nu 107 Cool Bru- Light**:
â­ Begin with clean eyebrows.
â­ Apply the pencil in upward strokes to create hair-like strokes.
â­ Use the spoolie brush to blend for a natural look.
â­ For longer-lasting results, use a Loreal brow setting gel.

**Loreal Browartist Leskinny Nu 105 Brunette- Dark**, the perfect solution for achieving natural, beautiful brows. Tired of sparse, unruly brows? With **Loreal Browartist Leskinny Nu 105 Brunette- Dark**, you'll get naturally defined and precise brows. No brow tints or microblading needed, the ultra-skinny 1.5mm tip creates hair-like strokes for a flawlessly natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Browartist Leskinny Nu 105 Brunette- Dark**:
â­ Begin with clean eyebrows.
â­ Apply in upward strokes to create hair-like strokes.

â­ For a perfect finish, use Brow Artist Plump and Set.

description_en:
**Loreal Infaillible 24h Fresh Wear Foundation Powder - 245 Golden Honey** provides all-day flawless coverage! This foundation powder combines the coverage and lasting power of a liquid foundation with a matte finish. Infused with ultra-fine adhesive pigments for all-day wear. It's easily blendable and gives your skin a natural, seamless look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Infaillible 24h Fresh Wear Foundation Powder - 245 Golden Honey**:
â­ Apply to skin using the included sponge applicator.
â­ Use wet for full coverage or dry for medium, buildable coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Infaillible 24h Fresh Wear Foundation Powder - 245 Golden Honey**:
â­ Talc
â­ Zinc Stearate
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Zea Mays Starch / Corn Starch
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Silica
â­ Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer
â­ Triethoxycaprylylsilane
â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Parfum / Fragrance
â­ Isoceteth-10
â­ Alaria Esculenta Extract
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Linalool
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Citronellol
â­ Tocopherol

(May contain Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides, Mica, other colorants). Ingredient list is subject to change. Please refer to product packaging for the most up-to-date list.

â­ Start with one pump of the product.
â­ Using a foundation brush or your fingertips, apply starting from the center of your face, blending towards the hairline and down the neck using circular motions and gently patting.
â­ Apply more product for heavier coverage.
â­ For longer-lasting coverage, use a makeup primer beforehand (sold separately).

**Loreal Foundation Infaillible 24H 145 - Beige** is a long-lasting liquid foundation that provides full coverage without feeling heavy. Designed to withstand the demands of daily life, **Loreal Foundation Infaillible 24H 145 - Beige** is transfer-proof and water-resistant, giving you a flawless look that lasts up to 24 hours. Its lightweight formula features innovative oxygen technology, making it easy to apply and comfortable to wear all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Foundation Infaillible 24H 145 - Beige**:
â­ Apply a primer before applying the foundation.
â­ Apply **Loreal Foundation Infaillible 24H 145 - Beige** with clean fingertips in a circular motion.
â­ Start from the center of your face and blend outwards.
â­ For best results, use a suitable foundation brush.

description_en:
**L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum Shade 7-8 Tan Deep**, your favorite serum foundation, now with even stronger benefits! Enjoy the perfect blend of skincare and makeup, with deeper skincare features. This hydrating foundation replumps your skin in just 1 hour! This hyaluronic acid serum foundation smooths, hydrates, and replumps skin like a serum while giving it a radiant finish and coverage just like a foundation.

â­ Enriched with plumping microepidermic Pure Hyaluronic Acid, 50 times smaller than standard hyaluronic acid, resulting in deeper penetration.
â­ Naturally illuminates and evens out skin tone, corrects imperfections, and enhances radiance.
â­ Deeply hydrates and visibly replumps the skin.
â­ Proven to smoothen skin over time.
â­ Lightweight.
â­ Seamlessly adapts to your skin tone and texture.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum Shade 7-8 Tan Deep**
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply 2-3 drops to your palm.
â­ Spread lightly with your fingers, just like your daily serum, onto clean skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum Shade 7-8 Tan Deep**
â­ [Ingredient list will be added here]

description_en:
**Loreal Volume Million Lashes Mascara Carbon - Black**: Discover L'Oreal Paris Volume Million Lashes Mascara: Defined, separated lashes with extreme blackness thanks to a highly flexible applicator to coat every single lash. No clumps, no lumps. The arched shape perfectly fits the eyelid, resulting in intensity, curl and volume on every lash from root to tip. The wild shiny black formula dresses your lashes in an intense black.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Volume Million Lashes Mascara Carbon - Black**:
â­ Brush onto lashes from root-to-tip.
â­ Move the brush from side to side across the base of lashes for even more lash separation.
â­ Apply additional coats until your desired eyelash volume is achieved.
â­ For a more dramatic lash look and defined eyes, apply to your lower lashes.
â­ Repeat as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Volume Million Lashes Mascara Carbon - Black**:
â­ Wild shiny black formula.
â­ Arched brush.

description_en:
**L'Oreal Paris Infallible Full Wear Concealer 115 - Beige**, provides full coverage that lasts for 24 hours! A new concealer from the Infallible range, perfect for concealing blemishes, dark circles, and uneven skin tone.  Use around the eyes or on the entire face, and it's sweat-resistant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Infallible Full Wear Concealer 115 - Beige**:
â­ Apply a small dot of concealer directly onto any blemishes and blend using your finger or a makeup brush.
â­ Use a lighter shade to conceal dark circles and brighten the under-eye area.

**L'Oreal Paris Infallible More Than Concealer 332 Amber** is your solution for concealing blemishes, dark circles, and uneven skin tone.  With 8 shades available, you can find your perfect match, making it more than just a concealer. Its high-pigment elastic formula provides full coverage with a lightweight feel.  Enjoy ultra-long wear, sweatproof, crease-proof formula with a natural matte finish. It comes with a super-sized applicator for easy and precise application. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Infallible More Than Concealer 332 Amber**:
â­ Use a shade that matches your skin tone, apply a small dot to blemishes and blend using your finger or a brush.
â­ Use a shade one or two shades lighter under your eyes to conceal dark circles.
â­ Use a shade two to three shades darker to contour your face.

**L'Oreal Paris True Match Powder C1 Rose Ivory** perfectly matches your skin's colour and texture for a flawless finish. Its fine, lightweight formula blends seamlessly, leaving your skin looking natural. Buildable coverage allows you to go from a sheer, complexion-evening layer to full coverage for concealing imperfections.  **L'Oreal Paris True Match Powder C1 Rose Ivory** features Jet Fusion Technology, making it 40% finer for a super-smooth, even finish.

â­ Use the provided sponge to gently apply the powder to your face for a natural look. 
â­ Use to set your makeup and/or concealer.

â­ Skin tone-enhancing pearl pigments. 
â­ Oil-free and non-comedogenic formula.

description_en:
**Loreal Infaillible Precision Longwear Eyeliner**: Create a stunning eye look that lasts all day long with **Loreal Infaillible Precision Longwear Eyeliner**. Its precise 0.4mm felt tip delivers intense black color and sharp, defined lines.  Lasting up to 24 hours, it's waterproof, smudge-proof, and transfer-proof, ensuring your makeup stays flawless. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Infaillible Precision Longwear Eyeliner**:
â­ Remove the cap and gently glide the eyeliner along your upper lash line.
â­ Use a thin line for a natural look, or repeat for a thicker line.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Infaillible Precision Longwear Eyeliner**:
â­Aqua / Water
â­Methylpropanediol
â­CI 77266 / Black 2
â­Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer
â­Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer
â­Cellulose
â­PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­Coco-Glucoside
â­Poloxamer 188
â­Citric Acid
â­Phenoxyethanol
â­Potassium Sorbate
â­Phenylpropanol
â­Sodium Benzoate
â­Caprylyl Glycol
â­Sodium Dehydroacetate
â­Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (F.I.L. Y290037/1).

description_en:
**L'Oreal Paris Brow Artist Genius Kit 02 Medium to Dark** is your go-to eyebrow kit for achieving perfectly sculpted brows. This versatile kit allows you to create anything from a natural to a bold brow look, all while matching your mood and skin tone.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Brow Artist Genius Kit 02 Medium to Dark**:
â­ Shape your brows using the tweezers.
â­ Set and shade your brows using the wax for up to a 12-hour hold, and the powder for a natural-looking colour.
â­ Style your brows using the angled spoolie brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Paris Brow Artist Genius Kit 02 Medium to Dark**:
â­ Brow powder.
â­ Pigmented wax.
â­ Angled spoolie brush.

description_en:
**Loreal Infaillible 24h 3.0 Brunette**: Dual-ended eyebrow pencil, ultra-thin retractable brow pencil and unique brush for drawing, shaping and defining eyebrows. â­Natural and soft result, ideal for sparse or overly-arched brows. â­Draw expertly defined and sculpted brows, a natural matte finish. â­Lightly color in brows with pencil by drawing fine hairlike strokes. â­Use built-in brush to distribute color and shape brows. â­Triangular tip to define and fill, built-in brush to grab and shape. â­Long-lasting formula, up to 24hr wear. â­Waterproof, smudge-proof, and transfer-resistant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Infaillible 24h 3.0 Brunette**: 
â­Step 1: Brush lightly to shape your brows.
â­Step 2: Fill in with the triangular pencil.
â­Step 3: Brush to blend the color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Infaillible 24h 3.0 Brunette**: (Ingredients may vary, please check packaging for the most up-to-date list.)

Its fine, lightweight formula blends seamlessly, leaving your skin looking naturally radiant. **Loreal Compact Powder Foundation Golden Beige** features an ultra-fine formula for buildable coverage â€“ use a single translucent layer to even your complexion or build up coverage to hide imperfections. description_en:
**Loreal Infaillible Micro Eyeliner Black** delivers intense and precise color payoff in one stroke. Its ultra-precise 0.01mm brush tip allows for perfect eye shaping that lasts up to 36 hours. Get a bold, long-lasting look all day long! â­ Waterproof â­ Smudge-proof â­ Transfer-proof â­ Intense color â­ Precise application â­ Lasts up to 36 hours

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Infaillible Micro Eyeliner Black**: 
â­ Remove the cap. â­ Gently glide the eyeliner along your upper lash line, as close to the lash line as possible. â­ Use a thin line for a subtle look, or repeat for a bolder look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Infaillible Micro Eyeliner Black**: 
â­ Aqua / Water / Eau â­ Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer â­ Butylene Glycol â­ 1,2-Hexanediol â­ Beheneth-30 â­ Phenoxyethanol â­ Hydroxyacetophenone â­ Caprylyl Glycol â­ Titanium/Titanium Dioxide â­ Aminomethyl Propanol â­ Polyglyceryl-3 Disiloxane Dimethicone â­ Citric Acid â­ Simethicone â­ Bentonite â­ Xanthan Gum â­ Sorbitan Laurate â­ Sorbitan Palmitate â­ Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides â­ Sorbitan Trioleate â­ Sucrose Palmitate â­ Tocopherol â­ [+/- May Contain / Peut Contenir ci 77491, Ci 77492 / Iron Oxides, Ci 73360 / Red 30, Ci 77266 [Nano] / Black 2, Ci 77510 / Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide, ]

**L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum Foundation**, your favorite serum foundation, now with even stronger benefits! Enjoy the perfect blend of skincare and makeup. Replumps your skin in just 1 hour! This hydrating hyaluronic acid serum foundation smoothes, hydrates, and replumps the skin.

â­ Shake the bottle well before use.

â­ Gently spread with your fingers onto clean skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal True Match Nude Serum Foundation**:
â­ AQUA / WATER , ISODODECANE , DIMETHICONE , GLYCERIN , ALCOHOL DENAT. , BUTYLENE GLYCOL , TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE , PEG10 DIMETHICONE , PERLITE , POLYGLYCERYL10 LAURATE , CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE , SODIUM HYALURONATE , SILICA , ISOPROPYL LAUROYL SARCOSINATE , DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE , DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE , BISPEG/PPG14/14 DIMETHICONE , MAGNESIUM SULFATE , SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE , ETHYLHEXYL HYDROXYSTEARATE , PHENOXYETHANOL , DIPENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAHYDROXYSTEARATE TETRAISOSTEARATE , S I L I C A S I LY L A T E , DISODIUM STEAROYL G L U T A M A T E , T O C O P H E R O L , ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE , SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE , [+/ MAY CONTAIN: CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE , CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / IRON OXIDES , CI 77163 / BISMUTH OXYCHLORIDE]. description_en:
**Loreal Infaillible 24h 5.23 Auburn** is a dual-ended eyebrow pencil; an ultra-thin retractable brow pencil and unique brush for drawing, shaping, and defining eyebrows. â­ Achieve a natural-looking result, perfect for sparse or overly-arched brows. â­ Draw fine hair-like strokes with the ultra-thin pencil. â­ Use the built-in brush to distribute color and shape brows. â­ Triangular tip to define and fill, built-in brush to grab and shape. â­ Long-lasting formula, up to 24hr wear. â­ Waterproof, smudge-proof, and transfer-resistant. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Infaillible 24h 5.23 Auburn**: 
â­ Step 1: Brush lightly to shape your brows. 
â­ Step 2: Fill in with the triangular pencil. 
â­ Step 3: Brush to blend the color.

description_en:
**Loreal Mascara Paradise Primer 01 White**:  Prepares your lashes for paradise, boosting mascara volume and improving eyelash care. The feather-soft brush coats lashes with a smooth formula enriched with nourishing jojoba oil and vitamins. Apply before your regular mascara for even longer, more conditioned lashes. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loreal Mascara Paradise Primer 01 White**:
â­ Apply the primer to the base of your lashes, gently sweeping upwards from root to tip.
â­ Layer your favorite Loreal Paradise mascara on top to boost volume and length.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loreal Mascara Paradise Primer 01 White**:
â­ AQUA / WATER, POLYBUTENE, PARAFFIN, POTASSIUM CETYL PHOSPHATE, CERA ALBA / BEESWAX, COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA / CARNAUBA WAX, STEARETH-2, CETYL ALCOHOL, ALCOHOL DENAT., PHENOXYETHANOL, HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE, ACACIA SENEGAL GUM, PANTHENOL, ETHYLENEDIAMINE/STEARYL DIMER DILINOLEATE COPOLYMER, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, HYDROGENATED JOJOBA OIL, HYDROGENATED PALM OIL, 2-OLEAMIDO-1,3-OCTADECANEDIOL, DISODIUM EDTA, BHT, ROSA CANINA FRUIT OIL, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, PROPYL GALLATE, CITRIC ACID.

It does not affect the natural vaginal pH, sperm, and is compatible with condoms.  It's free from hormones, fragrances, and irritants, and dermatologically tested.  **Masculan** is packaged to maintain its high quality at a low cost and is paraben-free.

description_en:
**Olaplex Hair Perfector No3 100ml** is a concentrated treatment that helps strengthen, protect, and repair damaged hair, restoring its healthy shine. It contains a patented, first-of-its-kind bond-building technology that helps to relink disulfide bonds broken by chemical, thermal, and mechanical damage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex Hair Perfector No3 100ml**:
â­ Use once a week, or two to three times a week for severely damaged hair.
â­ Apply to towel-dried hair.
â­ Apply a generous amount from roots to ends until hair is thoroughly saturated.
â­ Leave on for at least 10 minutes, or longer if desired.
â­ Rinse out with shampoo as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex Hair Perfector No3 100ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua), Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, Hydroxyethyl Ethylcellulose, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Quaternium-91, Sodium Benzoate, Cetrimonium Methosulfate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Fragrance (Parfum), Polyquaternium-37, Tetrasodium EDTA, Benzyl Benzoate, Etidronic Acid, Ascorbic Acid, Phytantriol,Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate

title_ar: **Ø£ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙƒØ³ Ø²ÙŠØª Ù„Ø¨Ù†Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø±Ù‚Ù…7 30Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Olaplex Bonding Oil No7 30ml** is a luxurious hair oil that dramatically increases shine, softness, and color vibrancy. This patented formula repairs severely damaged hair, instantly improving its shine and vitality. It minimizes flyaways and protects against UV rays and heat up to 450Â°F (232Â°C).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex Bonding Oil No7 30ml**:
â­ Apply a few drops to your hair.
â­ Use daily on damp or dry hair, or before heat styling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex Bonding Oil No7 30ml**:
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Isohexadecane
â­ C13-14 Isoparaffin
â­ Coco-Caprylate
â­ Phenyl Trimethicone
â­ Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate
â­ Propanediol
â­ Zea Mays (Corn) Oil
â­ Beta-Carotene
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­ Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil
â­ Punica Granatum Seed Oil
â­ Water (Aqua/Eau)
â­ Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Powder
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Eclipta Prostrata Extract
â­ Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate
â­ Limonene
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Citral
â­ Linalool
â­ Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract
â­ Citronellol
â­ Pseudozyma Epicola/Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate

Avoid contact with eyes.

description_en:
**Olaplex Bond Maintenance Shampoo No4 250ml** is a luxurious shampoo designed to repair damaged hair and rebuild broken bonds. It leaves your hair with incredible shine and silky smoothness.  **Olaplex Bond Maintenance Shampoo No4 250ml** is perfect for all hair types, improving its structure and giving it vitality and strength. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex Bond Maintenance Shampoo No4 250ml**:
â­Wet your hair thoroughly.
â­Apply an appropriate amount of shampoo to your hair.
â­Gently massage your hair.
â­Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex Bond Maintenance Shampoo No4 250ml**:
â­Water
â­Soybean Oil
â­Amodimethicone
â­Disodium EDTA
â­Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil
â­Sodium Polyaspartate
â­Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin
â­Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil
â­Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil
â­Butylene Glycol
â­Citric Acid
â­Conyza Canadensis Extract
â­Silica
â­Acetic Acid
â­Etidronic Acid
â­Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate
â­Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil
â­Propanediol
â­Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract
â­Punica Granatum Extract
â­Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Extract
â­Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract
â­Copolymer
â­Palmitoyl Myristyl Serinate

**Olaplex Bond Maintenance Conditioner No5 250ml** is a highly-moisturizing, reparative conditioner for all hair types. It leaves hair easier to manage, shinier and healthier with each use. Protects and repairs damaged hair, split ends, and frizz by re-linking broken bonds. It is color-safe and will strengthen and leave your hair stronger than ever.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex Bond Maintenance Conditioner No5 250ml**:
â­ Leave on for 3 minutes then rinse.
â­ Focus on ends and distribute evenly.
â­ For daily/every wash use.

description_en:
**Olaplex Bond Smoother Leave In No6 100ml** is a luxurious leave-in conditioner designed to moisturize and smooth hair, leaving it healthier and stronger. â­ Speeds up blow dry time while smoothing. â­ Softly defines and smooths air-dried curls. â­ Reduces frizz and flyaways for up to 72 hours. â­ Suitable for all hair types. â­ pH balanced. â­ Vegan. â­ Cruelty-free. â­ Gluten-free. â­ Nut-free. â­ Paraben-free. â­ Phthalate-free. â­ Phosphate-free. â­ Sulfate-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex Bond Smoother Leave In No6 100ml**: 
â­ Apply to damp hair from mid-lengths to ends. â­ Use after washing hair or as needed when styling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex Bond Smoother Leave In No6 100ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua/Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Isohexadecane, Coco-Caprylate, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Behentrimonium Chloride, Isododecane, Phenyl Trimethicone, Propanediol, Fragrance (Parfum), Cetrimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Glyceryl Stearate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Citral, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Disodium EDTA, Linalool, Citronellol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Gigartina Stellata Extract, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Extract, Hydroxycitronellal, Etidronic Acid, Tocopherol, Geraniol, Potassium Sorbate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ascorbic Acid, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Phytantriol, Pseudozyma Epicola/Camellia, Sinensis Seed Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate

description_en:
**Olaplex No.9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum 90 ml** is a luxurious, weightless, silicone-free hair serum designed to protect your hair from damage and frizz. **Olaplex No.9** gives you superior heat protection up to 450Â°F/232Â°C, plus 48-hour pollution protection. Enjoy healthy, shiny, vibrant hair with **Olaplex No.9**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex No.9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum 90 ml**: 
â­ Apply a small amount to damp, towel-dried hair. 
â­ Distribute evenly from ends to roots. 
â­ Use with other Olaplex styling products for best results. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex No.9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum 90 ml**: 
â­ Water (Aqua/Eau), Propanediol, Betaine, Quaternium-22, Sodium Hyaluronate, Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Panthenol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, PVP, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, Pelvetia Canaliculata Extract, Xylitylglucoside, Polyquaternium-44, Anhydroxylitol, Maltitol, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Xylitol, Sorbic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Citral, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
**Olaplex No.4P Blonde Enhancer Toning Shampoo 250 ml** is a highly concentrated purple shampoo designed to enhance blonde hair and neutralize unwanted yellow tones. This shampoo strengthens and softens hair, with a gentle formula suitable for frequent use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex No.4P Blonde Enhancer Toning Shampoo 250 ml**:
â­ Use 2-3 times per week or as needed.
â­ Apply to wet hair and lather fully.
â­ Leave on for 1-3 minutes, then rinse with cool water.
â­ For more intense toning, leave on for up to 5 minutes.
â­ It is recommended to use Olaplex No.4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo before this shampoo to remove any product buildup.
â­ Follow with Olaplex No.5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner or Olaplex No.8 Bond Intense Moisture Mask.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex No.4P Blonde Enhancer Toning Shampoo 250 ml**:
â­ Water (aqua/eau), dimethicone, cetyl alcohol, persea gratissima (avocado) oil, glycerin, stearyl alcohol, ethylhexyl olivate, behentrimonium chloride, cetrimonium bromide, limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) seed oil, oryza sativa (rice) bran oil, quaternium-80, squalane, rosa canina (rose hip) seed extract, ceramide ap, ceramide np, hydrolyzed jojoba esters, sodium hyaluronate, sodium pca, bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate, arginine, jojoba esters, panthenol, carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed oil, cannabis sativa (hemp) seed oil, glycine, alanine, serine, valine, isoleucine, proline, threonine, guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride, histidine, hydroxyethylcellulose, phenylalanine, aspartic acid, pca, phosphatidylcholine, citric acid, sodium lactate, ethylhexylglycerin, sodium benzoate, phenoxyethanol, bis-cetearyl amodimethicone, propylene glycol, isopropyl alcohol, sodium nitrate, tocopherol, fragrance (parfum), citral, hexyl cinnamal, limonene.

title_en: **Olaplex Lash Bond Building Serum 4.5 ml**
title_ar: **Ø£ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ø¨Ù„ÙŠÙƒØ³ Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… Ø¨Ù†Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ù…ÙˆØ´ 4.5 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Olaplex Lash Bond Building Serum 4.5 ml** is a high-performance lash serum for longer, thicker lashes. Every swipe of this clear, lightweight serum delivers high concentrations of NEW OLAPLEX Peptide Complex Technology, OLAPLEX Bond Building Technology, hydrating Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin to support and sustain the natural lash growth cycle. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex Lash Bond Building Serum 4.5 ml**: 
â­ Dip the brush once and apply along the upper lash line on both eyes. 
â­ Do not rinse. 
â­ Allow to dry for at least 90 seconds before applying other eye products. 
â­ Use 2 times daily, AM & PM, on clean, dry skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex Lash Bond Building Serum 4.5 ml**: 
â­ Water (Aqua/Eau), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-83 Amide, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Biotin, Panthenol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Pantethine, Aminomethyl Propanol, Sorbic Acid, Rhizobian Gum, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Dextran, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Sorbate. 

#Olaplex #lashserum #longlashes #beauty #makeup #skincare #hair #health #naturalingredients #KSA

description_en:
**Olaplex No.5P Blonde Enhancer Toning Conditioner 250 ml** is a luxurious purple conditioner that strengthens, softens, and neutralizes unwanted yellow tones. This conditioner leaves blonde hair looking bright and healthy from root to tip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Olaplex No.5P Blonde Enhancer Toning Conditioner 250 ml**:
â­ Apply a generous amount to clean, damp hair.
â­ Leave on for 3 minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use weekly or as needed.
â­ For best results, use after **Olaplex No.4P** shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Olaplex No.5P Blonde Enhancer Toning Conditioner 250 ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua, Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetrimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Parfum (Fragrance), PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Polyquaternium-7, Isopropyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Acid Violet 43 (CI 60730)
